original: śrīmadvidyācakravartiviracitā sañjīvanyākhyā vyākhyā viśvaṃ prakāśayati yā jātiguṇādyātmakaiḥ nijaiḥ prasaraiḥ /

original: sādṛśyanibandhanāyā iti vadatā sādṛśyaṃ saṃbandha-nibandhanā śabdavṛttirgauṇīti vadanto dūṣyatvena kaṭākṣitāḥ /
analyzed: sādṛśya nibandhanāyāḥ iti vadatā sādṛśyam saṃbandha nibandhanā śabda vṛttiḥ gauṇī iti vadantaḥ dūṣya tvena kaṭākṣitāḥ
dhvanya ācāryāṇām gauṇyā vṛttyā lakṣaṇa antarbhāvaḥ

original: sādṛśyanibandhanā lakṣaṇā vakroktyalaṅkāra “iti prathayatā kaścit dhvanibhedo lakṣaṇāmūlo
analyzed: sādṛśya nibandhanā lakṣaṇā vakrokti alaṅkāraḥ iti prathayatā kaścid dhvani bhedaḥ lakṣaṇā mūlaḥ
tyanta tiraskṛta vācya nāma alaṅkāra tvena uktaḥ kāvya ātma bhūtaḥ san alaṅkārya tvena na avadhāritaḥ iti yāvat

original: yasttvaṃśo 'laṅkāryo na bhavati so 'pyalaṅkāryatvena kathita ityāha-kevalaṃ guṇaviśiṣṭeti /
analyzed: yaḥ tu aṃśaḥ laṅkāryaḥ na bhavati saḥ u pi alaṅkārya tvena kathitaḥ iti āha kevalam guṇa viśiṣṭā iti
kevala grahaṇāt rasa alakāra nairapekṣyam kaṭākṣitam

original: rasālaṅkāra nirapekṣairmādhuryādi bhirguṇairviśiṣṭā yeyaṃ saṃghaṭanādharmabhūtā vaidarbhyādi rūpiṇī rītiḥ saiva kāvyātmetyuktā /
analyzed: rasa alaṅkāra nirapekṣaiḥ mādhurya ādi bhiḥ guṇaiḥ viśiṣṭā yā iyam saṃghaṭana dharma bhūtā vaidarbhī ādi rūpiṇī rītiḥ sā eva kāvya ātmā iti uktā

original: tathā ca sūtritaṃ tena - “rītiḥ ātmā kāvyasya“iti /
analyzed: tathā ca sūtritam tena rītiḥ ātmā kāvyasya eti

original: prakhyāpitaṃ ca - aviditaguṇāpi satkavibhaṇitiḥ karṇoṣu vamati madhudhārām /
analyzed: prakhyāpitam ca avidita guṇā api sat kavi bhaṇitiḥ karṇoṣu vamati madhu dhārām
an adhigata parimalā api hi harati dṛśam mālatī mālā
iti
idam api ayuktam iti bhāvaḥ
tathā āhi kāvyasya śarīra sthānīyau śabda arthau
kaṭaka mukuṭa ādi kalpāḥ anuprāsa upamā ādayaḥ
vyaṅgya arthaḥ tu ātma bhūtaḥ iti sthite

original: śabdālaṅkārebhyoṣa'pi yo bāhyo varṇālaṅkāro 'nuprāsastatsamakakṣyakā etā rītayaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ bāhyaḥ varṇālaṅkāraḥ nuprāsaḥ tad sama kakṣyakāḥ etāḥ rītayaḥ
yatas dvayoḥ api varṇa dharma tā

original: etadabhisandhāya vṛttyanuprāsavarṇālaṅkāraprastāve vaidarbhyādayo rītayo vivecitāḥ kāvyaprakāśa kṛdādibhiḥ /
analyzed: etat abhisandhāya vṛtti anuprāsa varṇālaṅkāra prastāve vaidarbhī ādayaḥ rītayaḥ vivecitāḥ kāvyaprakāśa kṛt ādibhiḥ
granthakāraḥ pi tatra vivecayiṣyati
vyañjakāsu etāsu vyaṅgya rasa sannikarṣāt ātma tva bhramaḥ uttāna dhiyām
tad anuprāsa ādau api samānam iti mandam etad rīti mātra pakṣapāti tvam
vastutas tu vyaṅgya arthaḥ eva ātmā kāvyasya
atha udbhaṭa ādibhiḥ guṇa alaṅkārayoḥ bhedaḥ na avadhāritaḥ iti āha audbhaṭa ādibhiḥ tu iti
sāmyam sajātīya tvam iti artha
tatra hetuḥ viṣaya mātreṇa bheda pratipādanāt iti
mātra grahaṇāt sva rūpa bheda abhāvaḥ kaṭākṣyate
kāvya śobhā hetutva lakṣaṇam tu svarūpam ekavidham evā iti teṣām āśayaḥ
viṣām āśayaḥ
viṣaya bhedam darśayati saṅghaṭana ityādi
saṅghaṭana adharma aguṇā
alaṅkārāḥ tu śabda artha dharmāḥ iti
tat idam api agambhīram iti bhāvaḥ
guṇa alaṅkārayoḥ ca svarūpataḥ eva ati vibhinna tvāt

original: tathāhi-aṅgino rasasya dharmā guṇāḥ aṅgayoḥ śabdārthayostvalaṅkārāḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi aṅginaḥ rasasya dharmāḥ guṇāḥ aṅgayoḥ śabda arthayoḥ tu alaṅkārāḥ
guṇāḥ tu niyamena utkarṣa hetavaḥ alaṅkārāḥ tu aniyamena
guṇāḥ samavāyena vartante
alaṅkārāḥ tu saṃyogena
yat āha ye rasasya aṅginaḥ dharmāḥ śaurya ādayaḥ iva ātmanaḥ
utkarṣa hetavaḥ te syuḥ acala sthitayaḥ guṇāḥ
upakurvanti tam santam ye ṅga dvāreṇa jātucit
hāra ādi vat alaṅkārāḥ te nuprāsa upamā ādayaḥ
iti

original: itthaṃ ca sati alaṅkārāpekṣayā guṇeṣveva prakṛṣṭaḥ kāvyopaskāraḥ yadvadasphuṭaṭālaṅkāratve 'pi kāvyatvābhyupagamaḥ,
analyzed: ittham ca sati alaṅkāra apekṣayā guṇeṣu eva prakṛṣṭaḥ kāvya upaskāraḥ yadvat asphuṭa ṭa alaṅkāra tve pi kāvya tva abhyupagamaḥ
na hi tadvat asphuṭa guṇa tve
yat āha analaṅkṛtī punar kvāpi iti
yat etat evaṃvidham guṇānām alaṅkārāṇām ca prādhānyam
tatra api purātanānām dṛṣṭiḥ asamīcīnā iti āha tat evam alaṅkārāḥ eva iti
atha vakrokti jīvitakāra bhaṭṭanāyaka dṛṣṭī sannikṛṣṭe dhvani darśanasya iti abhiprāyeṇa āha vakrokti jīvitakāraḥ punar ityādinā
vaidagdhya bhaṅgī bhaṇiti svabhāvām vaidagdhya prakāra upeta bhaṇiti svarūpām iti arthaḥ
jīvitam uktavān iti alaṅkāra mātra durāgraha abhāvaḥ dyotitaḥ

original: anyo 'pi sārabhūtaḥ sūkṣmoṃ'śaḥ tena avadhārita ityabhiprāyeṇāha-vyāpāraprādhānyaṃ ceti /
analyzed: sāra bhūtaḥ sūkṣma oṃśaḥ tena avadhāritaḥ iti abhiprāyeṇa āha vyāpāra prādhānyam ca iti
vyāpāraḥ rasa pratyāyana ātmā
tasya prādhānyam pratipede
na punar a prādhānasya alaṅkāra mātrasya iti yāvat
alaṅkārāḥ punar vācya kakṣyā eva asya saṃmatā iti āha abhidhā prakāra ityādi

original: yaśca vastvalaṅkārarasarūpaḥ trividhaḥ pratīyamānor'thaḥ yatra vidyamāno 'pi tatpratyāyanalakṣaṇasya' vyāpārasyaiva prādhānyamasya matamityāha-satyapi  #
analyzed: yaḥ ca vastu alaṅkāra rasa rūpaḥ trividhaḥ pratīyamāna ūrthaḥ yatra tad pratyāyana lakṣaṇasya vyāpārasya eva prādhānyam asya matam iti āha sati api
ca ityādi

original: upacāro lakṣaṇāśrayaṇāṃ tadvakrateti avivakṣitavācyādi samastadhvaniḥ kaṭākṣitaḥ /
analyzed: upacāraḥ lakṣaṇa āśrayaṇām tad vakra tā iti avivakṣita vācya ādi samasta dhvaniḥ kaṭākṣitaḥ

original: itthaṃ ca sati dhvanidarśanā detad darśanasyālpakobheda ityāha-'kevalamuktivaicitryeti' /
analyzed: ittham ca sati dhvani darśanāt etat darśanasya alpakaḥ bhedaḥ iti āha kevala mukti vaicitrya iti
atha bhaṭṭanāyaka matam bhaṭṭanāyakena tu ityādi
prauḍha uktyā abhyupagatasya iti
bhogaḥ iti sva kapola kalpitaḥ vyavahāraḥ prauḍhā uktiḥ tayā aṅgīkṛtasya iti arthaḥ

original: idṛśasya vyañjanavyāpārasya kāvyātmatvaṃ kathayatā nyagbhāvitaśabdārtha svarūpo 'yaṃ vyāpārastasyaiva prādhānyamuktam /
analyzed: idṛśasya vyañjana vyāpārasya kāvya ātma tvam kathayatā nyagbhāvita śabdārtha sva rūpaḥ yam vyāpāraḥ tasya eva prādhānyam uktam

original: sa ca vyāpāro laukiko na bhavatītyāha-tatrāpyabhidhābhāvaka tvetyādi /
analyzed: sa ca vyāpāraḥ laukikaḥ na bhavati iti āha tatra api abhidhā bhāvaka tva ityādi
tatra teṣu vyāpāreṣu madhyāt abhidhā bhāvaka tve iti
sākṣāt saṅketa artha viṣayā śaktiḥ abhidhā
asādhāraṇyena pratīteṣu artheṣu sādhāraṇīkaraṇa rūpā śaktiḥ bhāvika tvam

original: etadvyāpāradvaradvayot tīrṇaḥ sādhāraṇīkṛteṣu vibhāvādiṣu rasacarvaṇātmāṃ bhogāparanāmadheyo vyāpāro viśrāntisthānatayā prādhanyenāṅgīkṛtaḥ
analyzed: etad vyāpāra dvara dvaya ud tīrṇaḥ sādhāraṇīkṛteṣu vibhāva ādiṣu rasa carvaṇa ātmām bhoga apara nāmadheyaḥ vyāpāraḥ viśrānti sthāna tayā prādhanyena aṅgīkṛtaḥ
atra darśane bhoga ādi vyāvahārasya sva kapola kalpita vyāpāra prādhānyam iti aṃśaḥ dhvanikāra darśana vilakṣaṇāḥ
atha siddha antar dhvani kāraḥ punar ityādi
dhvanikāraḥ tu vyaṅgya ātmanaḥ vākyārthasya eva kāvya ātma tvam siddhāntitavān
tatra ha idatuḥ vyañjana vyāpārasya avaśya abhyupagamya tvāt iti
kīdṛśasya abhidhā lakṣaṇā tātparya ākhya vyāpāra traya uttīrṇasya
tātparya nāma padārtha adhigama samanantara bhāvinī samanvaya śaktiḥ
etat traya uttīrṇasya iti
dhvanana dyotana iti

original: dhvananaṃ dyotanaṃ pratyāyanaṃ vyañjanamityādiprasiddhaparyāyasahatastrasyāvaśyābhyupagamyatvāt tadanabhyupagame vyaṅgyārthapratītau na gatyantaraṃ
analyzed: dhvananam dyotanam pratyāyanam vyañjanam ityādi prasiddha paryāya sahata strasya avaśya abhyupagamya tvāt tad anabhyupagame vyaṅgya artha pratītau na gati antaram
atas vyaṅgyaḥ ṛthaḥ eva ātmā iti arthaḥ

original: nanu vyañjanāvyāpāraḥ pradhānaṃ kiṃ na bhavati,
analyzed: nanu vyañjanā vyāpāraḥ pradhānam kim na bhavati
iti atas āha vyāpārasya ca vākya artha tva abhāvāt iti
apratyakṣa tvena nirukti anarha tvāt vākya artha tva abhāvaḥ

original: sarvā eva khalu padārthaśaktayaḥ kāryādipratītyanyathānupapattyā abhyūhyanta eva /
analyzed: sarvāḥ eva khalu padārtha śaktayaḥ kārya ādi pratīti anyathā anupapattyā abhyūhyante eva
atas vyāpāraḥ na prādhānam

original: yaśca hetuḥ prādhānye so 'pi vyaṅgya evopapadyate,
analyzed: yaḥ ca hetuḥ prādhānye saḥ pi vyaṅgyaḥ eva upapadyate
na tu vyañjana vyāpāraḥ iti āha vākya arthasya eva iti
guṇa alaṅkāra upaskarttavya tvam viśrānti sthāna tvam ca prādhānye hetuḥ
atas vyaṅgya arthaḥ eva kāvya ātmā iti siddhāntitavan
atha bhūyastarāḥ yuktīḥ abhyuccinoti vyāpārasya viṣaya mukhena ityādi
vyāpārasya vyaṅyā artha mukhena eva svarūpa siddhiḥ
atas na vākya artha tva saṃbhavaḥ

original: yathāsvarūpopalambho viṣayamukhena tathā prādhānyaṃ vicārakṣamatvamapi tanmukhenaivetyāha-tatprādhānyena prādhānyāt /
analyzed: yathā sva rūpa upalambhaḥ viṣaya mukhena tathā prādhānyam vicāra kṣamatvam api tad mukhena eva iti āha tad prādhānyena prādhānyāt
svarūpeṇa vicārya tva abhāvāt iti ca

original: viṣaya eva tu puṣkalaṃ vākyārthaṃ bhāvamarhatītyāha-viṣayasyaiveti /
analyzed: viṣayaḥ eva tu puṣkalam vākya artham bhāvam arhati iti āha viṣayasya eva iti

original: sākṣātsvarūpa pratilaṃbhaḥ svataḥ prādhānyaṃ svalarūpeṇa vicāryatvaṃ cetyādi samagre bharaḥ /
analyzed: sākṣāt svarūpa pratilaṃbhaḥ svatas prādhānyam ca ityādi samagre bharaḥ
tad sahiṣṇu tvam hi vyāṅgya artha lakṣaṇasya viśaṣayasya eva
atas viṣayasya eva ātma tvam yuktam iti āha tasmāt viṣayaḥ eva iti

original: samagrabhara sahiṣṇutvāt sa niravaśeṣavaibhavamarhatītyata āha-yasya guṇālaṅkāretyādi /
analyzed: samagra bhara sahiṣṇu tvāt sa niravaśeṣa vaibhavam arhati iti atas āha yasya guṇa alaṅkāra ityādi

original: nanu rasādayo rasavadādyālaṅkārā eva prācāṃ matāḥ /
analyzed: nanu rasa ādayaḥ rasavat ādya alaṅkārāḥ eva prācām matāḥ
katham eṣām alaṅkārya tvam iti atas āha rasa ādayaḥ tu iti

original: tatra hetuḥ - alaṅkārāṇāmupaskārakatvāt rasādīnāṃ ca prādhānyenopaskāryatvācca iti /
analyzed: tatra hetuḥ alaṅkārāṇām upaskāraka tvāt rasa ādīnām ca prādhānyena upaskārya tvāt ca iti
rasa ādīnām hi yadā guṇībhāvaḥ tadā alaṅkāra tvam
yadā tu prādhānyam tadā alaṅkārya tvam eva
yatas ittham vyavasthā

original: atoḥ vyaṅgyārtha eva kāvyātmeti nigamayati - tasmād vyaṅgya evetyādi /
analyzed: atoḥ vyaṅgya arthaḥ eva kāvya ātmā iti nigamayati tasmāt vyaṅgyaḥ eva ityādi
vākya arthībhūtaḥ iti prādhānya daśām kaṭākṣayati
daśāyām anātma tvāt
tat idam dhvanikṛtaḥ darśanām
etad anusāri tvam ātmanaḥ darśa yutum āha eṣaḥ eva pakṣaḥ ityādi
eva kāreṇa pakṣa antareṣu anupapattiḥ āviśaṣkriyate
āvarjakaḥ balāt ātma abhimukhīkārakaḥ
tatra hetuḥ vyañjana vyāpārasya ityādi
ye vyaṅgya arthasya kāvya ātma tām
ye ca na icchanti

original: sarvaireva khalvebhiḥ na śakyate hi vyañjanavyāpāro 'pahnotum /
analyzed: sarvaiḥ eva khalu ebhiḥ na śakyate hi vyañjana vyāpāraḥ upahnotum

original: yadi nāpahnutaḥ kiṃ tata ityata āha-tadāśrayaṇe cetyādi /
analyzed: yadi na apahnutaḥ kim tatas iti atas āha tad āśrayaṇe ca ityādi
pakṣa antarasya apratiṣṭhānam darśaitacarībhiḥ yuktibhiḥ siddham

original: yattu tatra vyaktivivekakāraḥ pratyavasthaitaḥ tadupanyasyati - yattu vyaktivivekakāraḥ ityādinā /
analyzed: yat tu tatra vyakti viveka kāraḥ tat upanyasyati yat tu vyakti viveka kāraḥ ityādinā
liṅga tayā gamaka tayā
tādātmya tad utpatti abhāvāt iti
dharma dharmiṇoḥ liṅga liṅgi bhāve tādātmyam nāma niyataḥ sambandhaḥ
kārya kāraṇāyoḥ tu tad abhāve tad utpattiḥ nāma asti iti

original: anayorniyatasambandhayoḥ yadyanyataro na syāt tadā vyabhicārānna saṃbhavati liṅgaliṅgibhāva iti yāvat /
analyzed: anayoḥ niyata sambandhayoḥ yadi anyataraḥ na syāt tadā vyabhicārāt na saṃbhavati liṅga liṅgi bhāvaḥ iti yāvat
yatas ittham etat atas tat avicārita abhidhānam
tat etat vyakti viveka kṛtaḥ darśanam vāyasa vāśita kalpam iti yāvat
evam dhvani darśana samarthane yat yāvat asti yukti jātam tat ati gahanam
dhvani guṇībhūta vyaṅgyayoḥ eva kāvyayoḥ mīmāṃsāyām upayujyate

original: citrakāvyamīmāṃsāyāṃ tu nātyupayujyate ityāśayena nigamayiti-tadetat kuśāgrīyetyādi /
analyzed: citrakāvyamīmāṃsāyām tu na atyupayujyate iti āśayena kuśāgrīya ityādi
iha citrakāvye
na pratanyate
yathopayogam anūdyataḥ eva iti yāvat
atha yāvān upayogaḥ citra prastāve dhvaneḥ tāvat mātram anuvadati asti tāvat ityādinā

original: yadyasti kiṃ tata ityata āha-tatra vyaṅgyasyetyādi /
analyzed: yadi asti kim tatas iti atas āha tatra vyaṅgyasya ityādi
prādhānye dhvaniḥ namaḥ uttamaḥ kāvya bhedaḥ
aprādhānye tu madhyamaḥ
citrasya viṣayam āha tatra uttamaḥ dhvaniḥ ityādinā

original: sa cābhidhāmūlatayā lakṣaṇāmūlatayā ca prathate ityāha-tasya lakṣaṇābhidhāmūlatveneti /
analyzed: sa ca abhidhā mūla tayā lakṣaṇā mūla tayā ca prathate iti āhatasya lakṣaṇa abhidhā mūla tvena iti

original: lakṣaṇāmūlatve sati avivakṣita vācyākhyaḥ mukhyārthabādhaśālinyāṃ lakṣaṇāyāṃ vācyāṃśasyāvivakṣitatvāt /
analyzed: lakṣaṇā mūla tve sati avivakṣita vācya ākhyaḥ mukhya artha bādha śālinyām lakṣaṇāyām vācya aṃśasya avivakṣita tvāt
abhidhā mūla tve tu vivakṣita anya para vācya ākhyaḥ
abhidhāyām vācye bādhā abhāvāt vivakṣita tvam

original: vyaṅgyāṅgatvena vivakṣaṇāt anyaparatā ceti vivakṣitānyaparatvam abhidhāmūlasya /
analyzed: vyaṅgya aṅga tvena vivakṣaṇāt anya para tā ca iti vivakṣita anya para tvam abhidhā mūlasya
ittham lakṣaṇā mūlaḥ bhidhā mūlaḥ ca iti sāmānyatas dhvaniḥ dvirāśikaḥ
tatra lakṣaṇā mūlasya avāntarabhedam āha ādyaḥ ūrthantaraḥ iti
ādyaḥ lakṣaṇā mūlaḥ saḥ ṛtha antara saṅkramita vācyaḥ atyanta tiraskṛta vācyaḥ ca iti dvidhā
a jahat sva artha tayā sva siddhaye parākṣepe sati artha antara saṅkramita vācyaḥ

original: yathā - prārambhe śrutisundaraṃ pariṇātau pathyaṃ janaiḥsugrahaṃ /
analyzed: yathā prārambhe śruti sundaram pariṇātau pathyam janaiḥ sugraham
nānā śāstra rasaiḥ prasanna madhuraiḥ pratyakṣaram kṣālitam

original: āhlādāya na kasya nāma viduṣāṃ vaktrāmbujādudgataṃ cittāntarvikasadviveka mukulāmodānubiddhaṃ vacaḥ //
analyzed: āhlādāya na kasya nāma viduṣām vaktra ambujāt udgatam citta antar vikasat viveka mukula āmoda anubiddham vacaḥ
atra evaṃvidha vacaḥ upadeśa alakṣaṇe artha antare saṅkrāmati
vacaḥ mātrasya evam vaiśiṣṭya asaṃbhavāt

original: atha yadā jahatsvārthatayā parārthaṃ svasamarpaṇaṃ tadātyantatiraskṛtavācyākhyaḥ /
analyzed: atha yadā jahat svārtha tayā parārtham sva samarpaṇam tadā atyanta tiraskṛta vācya ākhyaḥ

original: yathā - eke mūkavadāsate jaḍadhiyo jihneti tatsannidhā vanye durviciktsitaṃ vidadhate tebhyo 'pi bībhatsate /

analyzed: ittham ca sati sāyam śabde dvayoḥ eka abhidhāna lakṣaṇāḥ saṅkaraḥ abhidhatte iti abhidhānam vācaka śabdaḥ eka vācaka anupraveśa lakṣaṇāḥ iti arthaḥ
lakṣya padam nirvivakṣuḥ āha śrekāḥ vidagdhāḥ iti
cheka upalālita tvāt śeka anuprāsaḥ iti arthaḥ
atha anuprāsa antarāya sūtram
anyathā tu vṛtti anuprāsaḥ
anayathātvam tridhā saṃbhavati iti āha kevala vyañjana ityādi
kevala vyañjana sādṛśyam samudāya tva abhāvāt anyathātvam
ekadhā samudāya sādṛśyam tu aneka dhātu avirahāt
tri ādīnām punar samudāyānām dvaya atirikta tvāt anyathātvam anusandheyam
lakṣya padam nirvakti vṛttiḥ tu iti

original: śṛṅgārādirasaviṣayo yo 'yaṃ pratiniyamabhājāṃ varṇānāṃ vyañjanavyāpāraḥ sa vṛttirucyate /
analyzed: śṛṅgāra ādi rasa viṣayaḥ yaḥ yam pratiniyama bhājām varṇānām vyañjana vyāpāraḥ sa vṛttiḥ ucyate

original: so 'yaṃ varṇavyāpāro 'smin varṇāracanātmake kavivyāpāre 'stītyupacāreṇa varṇaracanāvṛttirityāha-tadvatī punarityādi /
analyzed: saḥ yam smin kavi vyāpāre sti iti upacāreṇa varṇa racanā vṛttiḥ iti āha tadvatī punar ityādi
tasyāḥ traividhyam darśayati sā ca paruṣā ityādi
śruti pratikūla tā varṇānām paruṣa tvam
yā paruṣa varṇa ārabdhā sā gauḍīyī rītiḥ
yā tu komala varṇa ārabdhā sā avaidarbhī
madhyama varṇa ārabdhā tu pāñcālī
etāḥ rītayaḥ vāmana ādibhiḥ kāvya ātma tvena
upapatti paryālocanāyām tu kāvya ātma kathā tāvat āstām

original: yāvatā śabdālaṅkāreṣvapi yo bahiraṅgo vṛttyanuprāsātmā varṇālaṅkāraḥ taddharmatvāt tacchreṣabhūtā etā ityalamaprāsaṅgikavaidaddhya pravacanena
analyzed: yāvatā śabda alaṅkāreṣu api yaḥ bahis aṅgaḥ vṛtti anuprāsa ātmā varṇa alaṅkāraḥ tad dharma tvāt tad śreṣa bhūtāḥ etāḥ iti alam aprāsaṅgika vaidaddhya pravacanena
sahyai iti
viṣa drava mucaḥ iti
kiraṇa apekṣayā duḥsaha tvam
vāyu apekṣayā tu garala kalpa jala kaṇā yogaḥ

original: sitāsitaruceḥ uttaralatārakatvāt anavasthitavarṇasanniveśāḥ sācīkṛtāḥ apāṅgānnirgantum ivehamānāḥsālasā rasānuśayaṃ nivartamānāḥ /

original: sākūtā bhavatu paśyāma itīva vyāharantyaḥ sarasāḥ /

original: raso rāge viṣe vīrye tiktādau pārade drave /

original: itthaṃ ca sati padanubandhanatayā prātipadika mātranibandhanatayā ca lāṭānuprāso dvidhā mantavyaḥ /

original: mukhe roṣo na doṣāya nahīndo rnindāyai kalaṅkarekhetyarthāntanyāsaḥ /

original: prabhāpekṣayā mahatīti kathanāt svāpekṣayā tanvīti vivakṣyate /

original: ubhe hi khalu ete svāpekṣayā tanīyasyau prabhāpekṣayā tu mahatyau /

original: itthaṃ ca satyanupāttasyāpi sādhāraṇadharmasyānu gāmitayaikarūpyeṇa nirdeśa udāhṛto mantavyaḥ /

original: yadvā trimārgayetyetadeva tantreṇa nyāyena devīviśeṣaṇatayāpi saṅgacchrate /

ye hīyante tān prastauti tathā api nimittasya ityādi
taiḥ iti nimittā
n upādāna nibandhanaiḥ
ayam prakāraḥ iti pratīyamāna utprekṣā prakāraḥ iti arthaḥ

original: nimittānupādānaṃ na saṃbhavatīti yatpratijñātaṃ tatpramāṇo na draḍhayati-ivādyanupādāna ityādi /
analyzed: nimitta anupādānam na saṃbhavati iti yat pratijñātam tad pramāṇaḥ na draḍhayati iva ādi anupādāne ityādi
iva ādi anupādāna nimitta kīrtanayoḥ anyatara abhāve na

original: anupāttanimittakā hi yā vācyotprekṣā tasyām ivādyupādānabalādevotprekṣaṇapratītiḥ /
analyzed: anupātta nimittakā hi yā vācya utprekṣā tasyām iva ādi upādāna balāt evā utprekṣaṇa pratītiḥ
iha punar iva ādi anupādāna vandhyāyām pratīyamānāyām nimitta balāt eva iti nimitta upādāna niyamaḥ
sva rūpa utprekṣaṇam api na saṃbhavati iti āha prāyas ca ityādi

original: prāyograhaṇāt paryāyoktanayena svarūpasya kvacitsaṃbhavadapyutprekṣaṇaṃ gamyasyāpibhaṅgyantarābhidhānānna nirāpaṇārhamiti dyotitam /
analyzed: prāyas grahaṇāt paryāya ukta nayena sva rūpasya kvacid saṃbhavat api utprekṣaṇam gamyasya api bhaṅgī antara abhidhānāt na nirāpaṇa arham iti dyotitam
pratīyamānām nigamayati tat evam iti
yathāsaṃbhavam saṃbhavam an atikramya
tathā hi pratīyamāna utprekṣā tāvat vācya utprekṣā prakṛtikā
vācya utprekṣā ṣaṇṇau atidhā uddiṣṭā
yathā jāti guṇa kriyā dravyāṇām utprekṣya tvena catasraḥ utprekṣāḥ
jātayaḥ pratisvam caturviśatidhā prathante
yathā jāti utprekṣā tāvat bhāva abhāva abhimāna rūpa tayā dvidhā
dvividhā api guṇa nimittikā
kriyā nimittikā ca
ittham caturdhā
sā ca upātta nimittā anupātta nimittā ca iti aṣṭadhā
aṣṭavidhā api hetu svarūpa phala utprekṣā rūpa tayā trividhā iti caturviśati prakārā
anena eva nayena anyat api utprekṣā trayam pratyekam caturviśatidhā mantavyam

original: tathā ca pratyekaṃ triskandhikā etā hetusvarūpaphalotprekṣaṇatayā skandhatrayamapi pratisvamaṣṭavidham /
analyzed: tathā ca pratyekam tri skandhikāḥ etāḥ hetu svarūpa phala utprekṣaṇatayā skandha trayam api pratisvam aṣṭavidham
tathā hi upātta guṇa nimittā bhāva abhimāna rūpiṇī hetu jāti utprekṣā
sā eva an upātta guṇa nimittā
tathā upātta kriyā nimittā
sā eva anupātta kriyā nimittā ca iti bhāva abhimāna rūpa tayā caturdhā
evam abhāva abhimāna rūpa tayā caturdhā iti hetu utprekṣā skandhaḥ ṣṭavidhaḥ

original: anayaivarītyā svarūpotprekṣāskandhaḥ phalotprekṣāskandhaśca pratisvamaṣṭavidheti jātyutprekṣā triskandhatayā caturviśatidhā /
analyzed: anayā eva rītyā svarūpa utprekṣā skandhaḥ phala utprekṣā skandhaḥ ca pratisvam aṣṭavidhā iti jāti utprekṣā tri skandha tayā caturviśatidhā
evam guṇa kriyā dvavya utprekṣā api pratyekam caturviśatidhā vijñeyā
tatra dvavya utprekṣāyām hetu phala utprekṣā pāte ṣoḍaśaka hāniḥ
atas sthūladṛśā tāvat aśītividhā vācyā

original: pratīyamānāyāṃ tu anupāttanimittāyā niravaśeṣaṃ pāte aṣṭacatvāriśaddhāniḥ /
analyzed: pratīyamānāyām tu anupātta nimittāyāḥ niravaśeṣam pāte aṣṭacatvāriśat hāniḥ
upātta nimittāyām ca sva rūpa utprekṣā pāte ṣoḍaśaka hāniḥ
atas dvartriṃśat bhedāḥ pratīyamānāḥ mantavyāḥ
ubhaya rūpāyām api asya vaicitrya antarāya āha eṣā ca ityādi
artha āśrayā api artha alaṅkārā u pi iti arthaḥ
dharmaḥ guṇa kriyā ātmakaḥ viṣayaḥ yasya saḥ
śliṣṭa śabdaḥ kaścid hetuḥ bhavati asyāḥ
utprekṣā hi arthālaṅkāraḥ
śleṣaḥ punar ubhaya alaṅkāraḥ laṅkāra antara bādhakaḥ ca
tathā api saṃbhavati eṣā na bādhyate
na ca ubhaya alaṅkāra prātpiḥ iti yāvat
yathā ittham śleṣam utprekṣā aṅgam tathā upamā api aṅgam asyāḥ bhavati iti āha kvacid padārtha anvaya ityādi
tathā upakrāntā api upamā vākya artha tātparya paryālocana mahimnā abhimantuḥ saṃbhāvayituḥ vyāpāraḥ
utprekṣāyām paryavasyati
atha apahnuti prastāvaḥ
utprekṣā aṅga tvena yat apahnutiḥ pratijñā antā
tasyāḥ ayam avasaraḥ iti abhiprāyeṇa āha kvacid śrala ādi ityādi
ittham ye prakārāḥ uktāḥ

original: ye ca vakṣyante teṣāṃ vaicitryādasyā iyattaiva nāstītyāha-ataścoktavakṣyamāṇetyādi /
analyzed: ye ca vakṣyante teṣām vaicitryāt asyāḥ iyat tā eva na asti iti āha atas ca ukta vakṣyamāṇa ityādi

original: nanu yadyānantyaṃ kathamudāharaṇato darśayiṣyate ityata āha-sāmpratantvityādi /
analyzed: nanu yadi ānantyam katham udāharaṇataḥ darśayiṣyate iti atas āha sāmpratantu ityādi
diś mātreṇa ityādi

original: yathā diṅmātreṇodāhṛtā api nyāyataḥsākalyena jñātuṃ śakyate,
analyzed: yathā diś mātreṇa udāhṛtāḥ api nyāyataḥ sākalyena jñātum śakyate
tathā iti yāvat
uddeśa kramam āviścikīrṣuḥ āha tatra jāti utprekṣā yathā iti
sa vaḥ pāyāt iti
kuṭila tva lakṣaṇaḥ guṇaḥ nimittam
aṅkura śabdaḥ jāti vacanaḥ
atas upātta guṇa nimittikā bhāva abhimāna rūpiṇī jāti utprekṣā iyam

original: tatra yadyapi svarūpamutprekṣyate na tu hetuphale,
analyzed: tatra yadi api svarūpam utprekṣyate na tu hetu phale
atha api uddeśa krama virodhāt sa oṃśaḥ na udājihīrṣitaḥ
evam udāharaṇeṣu udāhartavyāḥ viśeṣa aṃśāḥ svayam anusandheyāḥ
kramasya avivakṣaṇāt na asmābhiḥ pratisvam pratanyante
atra jāti utprekṣā tvam vivicya darśayati atra aṅkura ityādi
atha kriyā utprekṣā ālimpati iva ityādi

original: na ca mantavyaṃ varṣaṇasya nabhaḥkartṛkatvāt na tamogatatvamiti /
analyzed: na ca mantavyam varṣaṇasya nabhaḥ kartṛka tvāt na tamaḥ gata tvam iti

original: nabhaso 'pi tamasādhiṣṭhintasyaiva varṣaṇakartṛkatvasaṃbhavādanena paraṃparāyātāyā api sambhāvanāyā utprekṣātvaṃ dyotitam /
analyzed: pi varṣaṇa kartṛka tva saṃbhavāt anena paraṃparā āyātāyāḥ api sambhāvanāyāḥ utprekṣā tvam dyotitam
nanu uttara ardha anudāharaṇe kaḥ hetuḥ iti atas āha auttare tu ityādi
upamā eva na utprekṣā iti
atra etat upahvaram upamāna aṃśaḥ ced lokataḥ siddhaḥ tadā upamā eva dvayoḥ siddha tvāt iva śabdaḥ sādharmya dyotakaḥ
yadā tu kavi kalpitaḥ tadā utprakṣā eva
upamānasya saṃbhavāt iva śabdaḥ saṃbhāvanām dyotayati yatas
atra avāntaraślokau yadā ayam upamāna aṃśaḥ lokataḥ siddhim ṛcchrati
tadā upamā eva yena iva śabdaḥ sādharmya sūcakaḥ
yadā punar ayam lokāt asiddhaḥ kavi kalpitaḥ
tadā utprekṣā eva yena iva śabdaḥ saṃbhāvanā paraḥ
iti
atha guṇa utprekṣā sā eṣā asthalī iti
iyam pratiṣṭhamānasya dāśaratheḥ sītām pratyuktiḥ
guṇa utprekṣā tvam darśayati duḥkham guṇam iti
atha dravya utprekṣā pātālam etat iti
dravya tvam darśayati candrasya ityādi

original: udāharaṇacatuṣke 'pi anugataṃ viśeṣam uddhāṭayati-etāni bhāvābhimāna ityādi /
analyzed: udāharaṇa catuṣke pi anugatam viśeṣam uddhāṭayati etāni bhāva abhimānaḥ ityādi
atha abhāva abhimāna ikapola phalakau iti
kaṣṭa kṛcchrāt
tathāvidhau iti
kṣāma tā gamanam naisargikam
paraspara darśana abhāvaḥ hetu tvena utprekṣyate
atas eva abhāva abhimāna rūpanā
tat etat darśayati atra apaśyantau iti ityādi
nyāyasya su jñāna tvāt
sthālī pulāka nyāyena udāharaṇa mātram iti na vyutkrama doṣaḥ śaṅkanīyaḥ
krama apekṣayā tu jāti ādi utprekṣā puraskāreṇa udāhartavyam
tat etat abhisandhāya āha evam jāti ādau api ūhyam iti
ittham jāti ādi catuṣkam abhāva abhimāna rūpatayā udāhṛtam
atha bheda aṣṭakasya guṇa kriyā nimitta tā udāhartavyā
tatra guṇa nimittaka tvena udājihīrṣuḥ āha nava bisa latā ityādi
tad vivecita caram
evam guṇa nimittaka tvam kriyā ādi utprekṣā traye sphuṭatara tvāt udāharaṇa nirapekṣa niti abhisandhāya kriyā nimittaka tvena udāharati ridṛkṣam ityādi
kṣāma tā gamana lakṣaṇa kriyā hi adarśana utprekṣāyāḥ nimittam
iyatā ṣoḍaśakam udāhṛtam mantavyam

original: atha nimittopādānānupādānābhyāṃ ṣoḍaśakasya yaddvaividhyaṃ pratijñātaṃ tatra nimittopādānasya samanantarodāharaṇānyevodāharaṇatvena darśayati  #
analyzed: atha nimitta upādāna anupādānābhyām ṣoḍaśakasya yat dvaividhyam pratijñātam tatra nimitta upādānasya samanantara udāharaṇāni eva udāharaṇa tvena darśayati
ete nimitta ityādi
kuṭika tva kṣāma tā gamanayoḥ upādānāt anupādānam api udāhṛteṣu eva darśayati liṃpati iva ityādi

original: atra lepanāditvena saṃbhāvane vyāpanādi nimittaṃ nopāttam /
analyzed: atra lepana ādi tvena saṃbhāvane vyāpana ādi nimittam na upāttam
iyatā dvātriṃśat bhedāḥ udāhṛtāḥ
atha dvātriṃśat hetu phala svarūpa ātmaka tayā tridhā udāhartavyā
tatra hetu rūpatayā udāharati viśleṣa duḥkhāt iva ityādi
atra duḥkha guṇaḥ hetu tvena utprekṣitaḥ
ittham jāti kriye hetu tvena avagantavye
dravya utprekṣāyām tad abhāvāt tad nibandhanam aṣṭakam pātanīyam
atha svarūpatayā udāharati kubera juṣṭām ityādi
juṣṭām sevitām
kubera juṣṭā diś udīcī
sā pratināyikā tvena anusandhīyate
samayaḥ eka dartu viśeṣaḥ
anyadātu ananyatra gamana lakṣaṇāḥ saṃketaḥ
dakṣiṇasyām diśi nāyikā tvam anusandhīyate
vyalīkam aparādhaḥ
atra niśvāsasya svarūpam eva utprekṣyam
na tu hetuḥ phalam vā
ittham guṇa utprekṣā ādi traye svarūpa ātmaka tvam jñeyam
atha
atra darśana kriyā vipāṭana phala tvena utprekṣyate
ittham jāti guṇayoḥ api phala tvam anusandheyam
dravya utprekṣāyām hetu phala asaṃbhavāt tad nibandhanam ṣoḍaśakam pātanīyam
ittham aśītividhā api vācya utprekṣā sākalyena udāhṛta kalpā eva
tat etat nigamayan āha evam vācya utprekṣāyāḥ ityādi
atha pratīyamānā paripāṭyā udāhriyate mahilā sahaḥsā ityādinā
mahilā sahasra bharite tava hṛdaye subhaga sā amāntī
divasam ananya karmā aṅgam tanu api tanayati
divasam iti atyanta saṃyoge dvitīyā
pratīyamānām utprekṣām uddhāṭayatiamāa
nti ityatra ityādinā
nyāyasya su jñāna tvāt vistara bhīruḥ āha evam bheda antareṣu iti

original: arthāśriyāpi dharmaviṣaye śliṣṭa śabdahetukā saṃbhavatīti yoddiṣṭā tāmudāharati-śliṣṭaśabdetyādi /
analyzed: artha āśriyā api dharma viṣaye śliṣṭa śabda hetukā saṃbhavati iti yā uddiṣṭā tām udāharati śliṣṭa śabda ityādi
ananyā iti
prasiddhaḥ tyāgī iti gāna prakāraḥ
mārgaṇāḥ śārāḥ yācakāḥ ca
lakṣya yojanāya āha atra dharma viṣayaḥ iti

original: mārgaṇaviṣayībhāvo dharmaḥ saṃbhāvanāśaṃ eva pratītiviśrānteḥ śleṣo notprekṣābādhakaḥ /
analyzed: mārgaṇa viṣayībhāvaḥ dharmaḥ saṃbhāvanā śam eva pratīti viśrānteḥ śleṣaḥ na utprekṣā bādhakaḥ
kastūrī iti
rolamba abhṛṅgāḥ
aṅkaḥ paryāntaḥ
sthāsakaḥ carcikā
upamā upakrama tām upapādayati atra yadi api ityādi

original: “sarvaprātipadikebhya upamānārthe kvip ityeke ācāryā” iti sūtrārthaḥ /
analyzed: sarva prātipadikebhyaḥ upamāna arthe kvip iti eke ācāryāḥ iti sūtra arthaḥ
atra kvipaḥ māhātmyāt upa a pratītā api saṃbhāvanāyām paryavasyati iti

original: kaṇṭhatviṣāṃ tilakādirūpatvaniyamāsiddheḥ tilakādirūpatāpi kadācitsyādupamānāṃśe saṃbhāvanāprāṇatvameva natu vāstavatvam /
analyzed: kaṇṭha tviṣām tilaka ādi rūpa tva niyama asiddheḥ tilaka ādi rūpa tā api kadācid syāt upamāna aṃśe saṃbhāvanā prāṇa tvam eva na tu vāstava tvam
atas utprekṣāyām paryavasānam
tat idam abhisandhāya āha tathā api upamānasya ityādi

original: upamānasya tilakādeḥ prakṛte kaṇṭhatviṅruḍpe saṃbhavaicityāt saṃbhāvanamātrasyocitatvāt /
analyzed: upamānasya tilaka ādeḥ prakṛte kaṇṭha tviṅ ruḍpe saṃbha vaicityāt saṃbhāvana mātrasya ucita tvāt
saṃbhāvanasya utthāne utprekṣaṇasya udayāt
atha upamā arthaka pratyaya antara prayoge upamā upakrama tvam darśayitum āha yathā vā ityādi
keyūrāyitam iti atra api hi kiyaṅgaḥ māhātmyāt upamā pratītiḥ aṅgada ādeḥ
keyūra ādi vat ācaraṇe niyama abhāvāt tathātva saṃbhāvanāyām utprekṣā eva paryavasyati
atha upamāna aṃśasya siddhasya kavi kalpanā āyāta tve sarvā eva upamā
śabda māhātmyāt āmukhe pratītā api utprekṣā tvena paryavasyati iti abhisandhāya āha eṣā ca ityādi
aprapañcane hetum āha iti tu iti
gatāsu tīram iti
sa saṃbhramā gatiḥ phena ullāsa hetuḥ
atra iva śabdāt aṭṭahāsasya saṃbhāvya tā

original: yattu vyaktivivekakṛdīddaśi viṣaye manyate-“ivādiśabdaireva prakṛtārthasyāsattvapratīteḥ chralādiśabdāḥ punaraktā” iti tat mandam /
analyzed: yat tu vyakti viveka kṛt īddaśi viṣaye manyate iva ādi śabdaiḥ eva prakṛta arthasya asattva pratīteḥ chrala ādi śabdāḥ punar aktāḥ iti tat mandam

original: na khalvīddaśi viṣaye chalādiśabdāprayoge 'pi prakṛtārthasyāsatyāsatyatā gamyate /
analyzed: na khalu īddaśi viṣaye chala ādi śabda a prayoge pi prakṛta arthasya asatya asatya tā gamyate

original: api tu utprekṣāṃ prati hetubhāva eva /
analyzed: api tu utprekṣām prati hetu bhāvaḥ eva
yathā atra eva phena paraṃparābhiḥ iti pāṭhe
atas sāpahnava tva lakṣaṇam utprekṣā vaicitryam śrala ādi prayoga eka śaraṇam
tat etat abhisandhāya āha atra ivaśabda ityādi

original: athotprekṣāyā eva prapañcanārthaṃ tattadalaṅkārabījabhūta tattatpadāvāpoddhārābhyām alaṅkāravaicitryamāvirbhavatīti vyutpādayati-apara ivetyādinā
analyzed: atha utprekṣāyāḥ eva prapañcana artham tad tad alaṅkāra bīja bhūta tad tad pada āvāpa uddhārābhyām alaṅkāra vaicitryam āvirbhavati iti vyutpādayati apare iva ityādinā
apara śabda aprayoge pi pākaśāsanaḥ siddha tayā pratīyate iti upamā eva
tad prayoge tu prakṛtaḥ rājā eva apara pāśa āsana tvena adhyavasīyate
iva śabdāt ca adhyavasānasya sādhya tā iti utprekṣā eva
iva śabda apohe rūpaka bheda prādhānya pratīteḥ
ittham nānā vaicitrya nirbharāyām asyām kutracid aṃśe niyamena vācya tā

original: kutracittu kāmacāraḥ iti vyutpipādayiṣurhetūtprekṣāṃ tāvat vyutpādayati-tadevaṃprakāretyādinā /
analyzed: kutracid tu kāmacāraḥ iti vyutpipādayiṣuḥ hetu utprekṣām tāvat vyutpādayati tat evaṃprakāra ityādinā
prakṛta saṃbandhinaḥ upameya saṃbandhinaḥ
yasya dharmasya hetuḥ utprekṣyate

original: sa dharmo 'dhyavasāyavaśāt abhedopacaraṇavaśāt abhinna utprekṣānimittamāśrīyate niyamena vācyo bhavati /
analyzed: sa dharmaḥ dhī avasāya vaśāt abheda upacaraṇa vaśāt abhinnaḥ utprekṣā nimittam āśrīyate niyamena vācyaḥ bhavati
asya upamāna dharmeṇa saha abheda āśrayaṇam vācya tvam vā iti niyama dvayam anusandheyam

original: yadaivaṃ na syāt tadotprekṣamāṇo heturabhittikameva citraṃ syādityāha-anyathā kaṃ pratīti /
analyzed: yadā evam na syāt tadā utprekṣamāṇaḥ hetuḥ abhittikam eva citram syāt iti āha anyathā kam prati iti
tām imām vyavasthām udāharaṇataḥ hṛdayam gamayati yathā a paśyantau ityādinā

original: atra kapolau prakṛtau tatsaṃbandhī dharmaḥ kṣāmatā taddhetutvena darśanamutprekṣatam /
analyzed: atra kapolau prakṛtau tad saṃbandhī dharmaḥ kṣāma tā tad hetu tvena darśanam

original: tadutprekṣaṇe ca na kevalā kapolakṣāmatā nimittam,
analyzed: tad utprekṣaṇe ca na kevalā kapola kṣāma tā nimittam

original: api tu loke parasparamadraṣṭroryā kṣāmatā tadabhinnatvenā dhyavasitā saivaṃ cotprekṣitā darśanalakṣaṇasya hetoḥ phalam /
analyzed: api tu loke parasparam adraṣṭroḥ yā kṣāma tā tad abhinna tvena ā dhī avasitā sā evam ca utprekṣitā darśana lakṣaṇasya hetoḥ phalam
tat adam abhindhāya āha atra kapolayoḥ ityādi
tat ca bhinnam iti phala daśāyām abhedena adhyavasīyate iti arthaḥ

original: adarśanaṃ pratya prakṛtaiva hi kṣāmatā phalaṃ,
analyzed: adarśanam prakṛtā eva hi kṣāma tā phalam
tatra nimittam hetu utprekṣaṇe prayojakam
parasparam adraṣṭroḥ yat kṣāma tā gamanam tena saha abhedena adhyavasitam iti arthaḥ
iyam abhāva abhimāna rūpa kriyā lakṣaṇā hetu utprekṣā
evam bhāva abhimāna rūpa lakṣaṇā hetu utprekṣāyām api nyāyaḥ samānaḥ iti āha evam dṛśyatā ityādinā
atrā api hi nūpura gata mauni tvasya hetu tvena duḥkham utprekṣitam

original: tadutprekṣaṇe ca laukikaduḥkhamaunatvābhedenādhyavasitaṃ nūpuramaunitvameva nimittaṃ duḥkotprekṣaṇaphalaṃ ca /
analyzed: tad utprekṣaṇe ca laukika duḥkha mauna tva abhedena adhyavasitam nūpura mauni tvam eva nimittam duḥka utprekṣaṇa phalam ca
iyam prakriyā sarvatra eva hetu utprekṣāyām ekarūpā iti āha evam sarvatra iti
atha sva rūpa utprekṣāyām kvacid dharmīm dharmi antara gata tvena adhyavasīyate
kvacid tu dharmaḥ eva dharmi antara gata tvena
tatra ubhayatra api nimitta aṃśaḥ kadācid vācyaḥ bhavati
kadācid tu na iti vivecayutum ārabhate svarūpa utprekṣāyām yatra dharmī ityādinā
sa vaḥ pāyāt ityādi
atrā indu kalā kapāla aṅkurayoḥ sādharmyasya asiddha tvāt
kuṭila tva lakṣaṇasya śabdena upādānam
velā iva rāga sāgarasya iti atra tu saṃkṣobha kāri tāyāḥ prasiddha tvāt anupādānam

original: atha dharmasya dharmigatatvenādhyavasāne nimittopādānānupādāne darśayati-yatra ca dharmaṃ evetyādi /
analyzed: atha dharmasya dharmi gata tvena adhyavasāne nimitta upādāna anupādāne darśayati yatra ca dharmam eva ityādi

dviṣām bhūḥ iti samanvayaḥ
atra dharma saṃbhāvanam

lipmatī iva iti
nimitta anupādānam vivecayati atra tamaḥ gata ityādi

original: nanu dharme dharmotprekṣaṇavaicitryāya vyāpane lepanamutprekṣyatāmityata āha-vyāpānādau tviti /
analyzed: nanu dharme dharma utprekṣaṇa vaicitryāya vyāpane lepanam utprekṣyatām iti atas āha vyāpāna ādau tu iti

yathā lepana utprekṣaṇe vyāpanam nimitta tvena gamyate
na hi tathā vyāpana utprekṣaṇe nimittam anyat avagamyate

original: ato 'navagatasya kalpanamavagatasya parityāga iti doṣadvayamāpatediti bhāvaḥ /

original: yadi vyāpanameva utprekṣaṇaviṣayaḥ na hi tasyagamyamānatā yuktā /

tatra hetuḥ tasya utprekṣita ādhāra tvena iti
utprekṣitam utprekṣiṇam

atas lepanam eva utprekṣyam iti nigamayati tasmāt yathā uktam ervā iti
atha phala utprekṣāyām nimitta anupādānam asaṃbhavam iti ārabhate phala utprekṣāyām ityādi

tat eva utprekṣaṇa nimittam

tat idam udāhṛtya darśayati ratha sthitānām iti
atra uttara diśaḥ turaga utpatti bhūmi tvāt tad gamanam purātana turaṅga parivartane hetuḥ
tat eva utprekṣaṇa nimittam

original: tadanupādāne parivartamānaṃ utprekṣyamāṇaṃ kasya phalaṃ syāt /
analyzed: tad an upādāne parivartamānam utprekṣyamāṇam kasya phalam syāt
tat idam abhipretya āha atra parivartanasya ityādi

original: anenāśīcilidhatvena dṛṣṭeṣu prabhedeṣu punaḥ keṣāñcit pātodarśitaḥ /
analyzed: anena āśīcilidha tvena dṛṣṭeṣu prabhedeṣu punar keṣāñcid pātaḥ darśitaḥ

original: tathāhi-upāttanimittā ye ṣoḍaṣabhedāsteṣāṃ pratisvaṃ hetusvarūpa phalotprekṣaṇarūpatve aṣṭacatvāriṃśat /

atas tad ṣaṭpañcāśat eva prabhedāḥ
yat ittham iyam utprekṣā ati sūkṣmā īkṣikayā prapañcitā

kakṣyā vibhāgaḥ jāti guṇa ādi rūpa tayā sthitaḥ

original: atha manyepramukhasya śabdasya saṃbhāvanādyotakatve 'pi tatprayogamātreṇotprekṣābhramo na kārya iti vyutpādayati-asyāścetyādi /

sā caturvidhā

original: hetau svarūpe cotprekṣye phale ṣaṇṇāvatiḥ punaḥ /

adhyavasita prādhānye tu atiśayoktiḥ

antar nīta tve nigīrṇa tve

original: tvadaṅgamārdavaṃ paśyataḥ sarvasyaiva citte mālatyādīnāṃ kaṭhoratāvabhāsata ityarthaḥ /

adhikāram anusmārayan sāmagrīm asyāḥ vivinakti bheda prādhānye iti eva ityādinā

original: nanu sahārtha tayā tulyakakṣyayoḥ kathaṃ bhedapradhānatetyata āha-guṇapradhānabhāvetyādi /
analyzed: nanu tayā tulya kakṣyayoḥ katham bheda pradhāna tā iti atas āha guṇa pradhāna bhāva ityādi
satyam
saha artha sāmarthyāt sādharmyam eva atra

original: bhedaprādhānyaṃ tu vyatirekanayena sādhārmyabhitti kamiha na bhavati api tu guṇā pradhānabhāvabhittikamiti yāvat /
analyzed: bheda prādhānyam tu vyatireka nayena sādhārmya bhitti kam iha na bhavati api tu guṇā pradhāna bhāva bhittikam iti yāvat
nanu samāna yoga tve guṇa prādhāna bhāvaḥ pi kīdṛś iti atas āha saha artha praktā iti

original: sahārtho hi tṛtīyāṃ taṃ guṇatvena prayojayati /
analyzed: saha arthaḥ hi tṛtīyām tam guṇa tvena prayojayati

original: nanu sahārthatve ka upamānopameyabhāva ityata āha-upamānopameyatvaṃ cetyādi /
analyzed: nanu saha artha tve kaḥ upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ iti atas āha aupamāna upameya tvam ca ityādi
tat hi tṛtīyā antasya viśeṣaṇa tvāt upamāna tvam vivakṣyate
itarasya tu viśeṣya tvāt upameya tvam

original: ato vaivakṣikameva na tu vāstavamiti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: atas vaivakṣikam eva na tu vāstavam iti bhāvaḥ
avāstata tve hetum āha dvayoḥ api ityādi

original: nanu dvayoḥ prākaraṇikatvamevāprākaraṇikatvameva vetikiṃ niyāmakamityata āha-sahārthasāmarthyāditi /
analyzed: nanu dvayoḥ prākaraṇika tvam eva aprākaraṇika tvam eva vā iti kim niyāmakam iti atas āha saha artha sāmarthyāt iti

original: nanu tarhi vaivakṣikatve katarat kena rūpeṇa vivakṣyatāmityata āha-tṛtīyāntasyetyādi /
analyzed: nanu tarhi vaivakṣika tve katarat kena rūpeṇa vivakṣyatām iti atas āha tṛtīyā antasya ityādi
nanu pradhānam api tṛtīyā antena nirdeśam arhati iti atas āha śābdaḥ ca iti

original: sahaśabdo hi niyamena tṛtīyāntasya śābdaguṇatvaṃ kalpayati /
analyzed: saha śabdaḥ hi niyamena tṛtīyā antasya śābda guṇa tvam kalpayati
itarasya tu prādhānyam
tarhi artha apekṣayā kā sthitiḥ iti atas āha vastutas tu iti
guṇasya api prādhānyam
pradhānasya api guṇa tvam viparyayaḥ
api śabdāt anavasthitiḥ api

original: evaṃ nyāyakrame sthite 'pi viśeṣo 'nyo 'syāḥ prayojaka ityāha-tatrāpītyādi /
analyzed: evam nyāya krame sthite viśeṣaḥ syāḥ prayojakaḥ iti āha tatra api ityādi

original: atiśayoktirapi na sākalyena asyā mūlamityata āha-sā cetyādi /
analyzed: atiśayoktiḥ api na sākalyena asyāḥ mūlam iti atas āha sā ca ityādi

original: kāryakāraṇapratiniyamaviparyayo 'tra tulyakālatā na tu kāryasya pūrvakālatā sahārthatvāt /
analyzed: kārya kāraṇa pratiniyama viparyayaḥ tulya kāla tā na tu kāryasya pūrva kāla tā saha artha tvāt
abheda adhyavasāyaḥ tu dvidhā bhavati iti āha abheda adhyavasāyaḥ ca ityādi
tena iyam trividhā upakṣitpā
vaicitrya antaram upakṣipati sāhityam ca atrya ityādi

original: kartṛkarmādi sāhityanibandhanenāpi prābhedena prathata iti yāvat /
analyzed: kartṛ karma ādi sāhitya nibandhanena api prābhedena prathate iti yāvat
krameṇa udāharaṇāni
bhavat aparādhaiḥ iti atra aparādhānām tṛtīyā anta tvāt guṇa tā
santāpasya prathama anta tvāt pradhāna tā
atas guṇa pradhāna bhāva nibandhanā eva atra bheda pradhāna tā
na punar vṛddhi kriyā nibandhanā
sa ca guṇa pradhāna bhāvaḥ saha artha prayuktaḥ
dvayoḥ ca prākaraṇika tvāt upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ vaivakṣikaḥ

original: aparādhānāṃ ca tṛtīyāntatvāt viśeṣaṇānāmupamānatvaṃ niyatamaparādhā yathā vardhanta iti /
analyzed: aparādhānām ca tṛtīyā anta tvāt viśeṣaṇānām upamāna tvam niyatam aparādhāḥ yathā vardhante iti

original: santāpasya tu pradhānatvādupameyatvaṃ santāpastathā vardhata iti /
analyzed: santāpasya tu pradhāna tvāt upameya tvam santāpaḥ tathā vardhate iti
sa ca ayam guṇa pradhāna bhāvaḥ śābdaḥ
artham vyapekṣya tu santāpaḥ eva iva
aparādhāḥ vardhante iti api prāpteḥ
nyāya kramaḥ udāharaṇa antareṣu api yojanīyaḥ
atra kārya kāraṇa sama kāla tva lakṣaṇa atiśayoktiḥ mulam iti darśayati atra aparādhānām ityādi

original: astaṃ bhāsvāniti-saṃhriyantāṃ viprakīrṇāni ekīkriyantāmityarthaḥ atra śleṣābhittikābhedādhyavasāyarūpā mūlamiti darśayati-atrāstaṅgamanamityādi
analyzed: astam bhāsvān iti saṃhriyantām viprakīrṇāni ekīkriyantām iti arthaḥ atra mūlam iti darśayati atra astaṅgamanam ityādi
astam ekadā giriḥ anyadātu avasādaḥ iti ubhaya artha tvam
kumuda dalaiḥ iti atra punar aśleṣa bhittikā bheda adhyavasāya rūpa mūlam iti darśayati atra vighaṭanam ityādi

original: evamatiśayoktimūlatvādilakṣaṇo yo viśeṣaḥ tadabhāve sahoktimātraṃ nālaṅkāra iti vyutpādayati-etadviśeṣeti /
analyzed: evam atiśayokti mūla tva ādi lakṣaṇaḥ yaḥ viśeṣaḥ tad abhāve sahokti mātram na alaṅkāraḥ iti vyutpādayati etad viśeṣa iti
pratyudāharati anena sārdham iti
kartṛ sāhitya lakṣaṇam vaicitryam api eṣu eva darśitam iti āha etāni eva iti
eṣu hi santāpa aparādha ādi kartṛ sāhityam dyu janaḥ iti
dyu janāḥ devāḥ
dyujanasya mṛtyunā saha manorathāvātpiḥ daitya bala kṣayaḥ
atra karma sāhityam darśayati atra karoti kriyā ityādi

original: dyujanamṛtyoḥ ātpikriyāpekṣayā kartṛtve 'pi tasyopasarjanatvāt neha kartṛsāhityam /
analyzed: dyu jana mṛtyoḥ ātpi kriyā apekṣayā kartṛ tve pi tasya upasarjana tvāt na iha kartṛ sāhityam
yā tu cakre iti
pradhāna bhūtā karoti kriyā tad apekṣayā karma tvāt karma sāhityam etat iti yāvat
evam karaṇa ādi sāhitya vaicitryam unneyam
atha punar vaicitryāya āha eyam ca iti
utprekṣitpam iti
dhanuṣaḥ utkṣepaḥ jyā vandha saṅghaṭṭanam
āsphālanam ākarṣaḥ
śilīmukha mokṣaḥ ityādi kramikāṇi dhānuṣka karmāṇi
tatra karṣaṇa mātra antam paripaṇānāt tāvanti eva upavarṇitāni
tatra ati vatsalasya kauśikasya pulakānām dhanuḥ utkṣepa sama samayam utkṣepaḥ
matsara grasta tvāt utkṣepa mātrā paritoṣitānām bhūpānām dhanuḥ nati sama
samayam mukha natiḥ
paripaṇatā ākarṣaṇasya janakasya nati antam saṃśaya anuvṛtteḥ
jyā āsphālana sama samayam saṃśaya buddhi āsphānam
vaidehyāḥ punar paripaṇana siddhi antam an ākṛṣṭa manaḥ samākarṣa sama samayam
manaḥ
samākarṣaḥ

original: bhārgavāhaṅkṛtikandalasya tu dhanurbhaṅgāntamabhagrasya bhaṅgasamasamayaṃ bhaṅgaḥśrīmatā rāmacandreṇākārīti samanvayāt karmasāhityamiha mālātvenāvatiṣṭhate
analyzed: bhārgava ahaṅkṛti kandalasya tu dhanuḥ bhaṅga antam abhagrasya bhaṅga sama samayam bhaṅgaḥ śrīmatā rāmacandreṇa akāri iti samanvayāt karma sāhityam iha mālā tvena avatiṣṭhate
evam anyat api mālā tvena jñeyam
guṇa prādhāna bhāvaḥ yaḥ śābdaḥ tena bhidā utkaṭā

atha vinā uktyau saṅgatim āha sahokti pratibhaṭa ityādi pratibhaṭa bhūtām pratiyogi bhūtām
tatra sūtram
vinā kañcid anyasya sat asat tva abhāvaḥ vinā uktiḥ
vyācaṣṭe sattvasya ityādi
vyatyayena abhāva śabda arthau
pratyekam abhisambadhyete
śobhana tva abhāvaḥ śobhana tvam tattva abhāvaḥ śobhana tvam iti

original: kañcidarthaṃ vinā yatra śobhanatvaṃ nāsti saikā vinoktaḥ /
analyzed: kañcid artham vinā yatra śobhana tvam nā asti sā ekā vinā uktaḥ
yatra tu aśobhana tvam na asti sā anyā iti dvirūpā iyam iti arthaḥ
nanu kasmiṃścid tattva asatve iti etāvatā eva kim
niṣedha dvaya āśrayaṇa gauraveṇa iti atas āha atra ca ityādi
anya nivṛtti prayuktā iti
anya nivṛttiḥ ced sat asat tva nivṛttim na prayojayati
tadā na vinokti alaṅkāraḥ

original: na hyasmin sati tattvamasattvaṃvetyuktau vicchittiḥ kācit /
analyzed: na hi asmin sati tattvam asattvam vā iti uktau vicchittiḥ kācid
atas sat asat tva nivṛttiḥ eva vinā ukti alaṅkāraḥ iti bhāvaḥ
asmin sati sattvam asattvam ca iti vastu vidhiḥ

original: sattvalaṅkāraphalatvena prātpe prakāśyata ityāha-evaṃ cānyanivṛttāvapi ityādi /
analyzed: sattva alaṅkāra phala tvena prakāśyate iti āha evam ca anya nivṛttau api ityādi
dvirūpāyāḥ api paripāṭyā udāharaṇam vinaya iti
atra vinaya śaśi satka tva nivṛttyā śrī niśāvidagdhā
vṛttiḥ iti sattva abhāva udāharaṇam

original: vinayādiṣu ca satsu śrīprabhṛtisadbhāvaḥ phalatvena prakāśyate /
analyzed: vinaya ādiṣu ca satsu śrī prabhṛti sadbhāvaḥ phala tvena prakāśyate
tat idam abhisandhāya āha atra vinaya ādi ityādi

original: vinādi śabdābhāve tadarthaṃ sadbhāve vinoktireveti vyutpādayitumāha-atra vinā śabda ityādi /
analyzed: vinā ādi śabda abhāve tad artham sadbhāve vinā uktiḥ eva iti vyutpādayitum āha atra vinā śabdaḥ ityādi
yathā saha uktau iti
sahoktau api ayam nyāyaḥ iti yāvat
atra udāharati nirarthakam janma iti

original: atra tuhināśudarśanaṃ vinā nalinījanma na śobhanamiti pratīyate /
analyzed: atra tuhina āśu darśanam vinā nalinī janma na śobhanam iti pratīyate
a taḥ vinā uktiḥ iyam
vinā śabda anupādāne tu ārthī iti viśeṣaḥ
tat idam abhisandhāya āha etyādau vinā uktiḥ eva ityādi

original: atra ca hetuhetumadbhāvavyaktayo vinoktereva vicchittiviśeṣādhāyakaḥ na punaralaṅkārāntaramityāha-iyaṃ ca parasparetyādi /
analyzed: atra ca hetu hetumat bhāva vyaktayaḥ vinā ukteḥ eva vicchitti viśeṣa ādhāyakaḥ na punar alaṅkāra antaram iti āha eyam ca paraspara ityādi
udāhṛta viṣaye iti
nirarthakam janma iti ayam udāhṛtaḥ viṣayaḥ
mṛga locanayā iti

original: loke hi mṛgalocanāṃ vinā vicitravyavahārapratibhāprāgalbhyaṃ nāsti suhṛdā vinā ca sundarāśayatvam /
analyzed: loke hi mṛga locanām vinā vicitra vyavahāra pratibhā prāgalbhyam nā asti suhṛdā vinā ca sundara āśaya tvam
asya tu narendra sūnoḥ na tayā iti śloka arthaḥ
asattvāḥ bhāvam darśayati atra aśobhana tva abhāvāt ityādi
pratibhā prāgalbhyam sundara āśaya tvam ca śobhana padārthau
nigamayati sā eṣā dvidhā iti
sat asat tva nivṛttiḥ ced nivṛttyā anyasya varṇyate
tadā dvidhā vinā uktiḥ spāt vidhiḥ atra phalam bhavet

original: atha viśeṣaṇavicchittimūlau samāsoktiparikarau prastauti - adhunā viśeṣaṇeti /
analyzed: atha viśeṣaṇa vicchitti mūlau samāsokti parikarau prastauti adhunā viśeṣaṇa iti

original: viśeṣaṇa vicchittiśca dvirūpā sābhyaṃ sābhiprāyatā ca /
analyzed: viśeṣaṇa vicchittiḥ ca dvirūpā sābhyam sa abhiprāya tā ca
sāmye samāsoktim adhikaroti tatra ādau ityādi
tatra sūtram
viśeṣeṇa sāmyāt aprastutasya gamya tve samāsoktiḥ

original: yatra viśeṣyāṃśe prakṛtamātraparatā viśeṣaṇasāmyāt punaraprakṛto 'vagamyate sā samāsena saṃkṣepeṇā abhidhānāt samāsoktiḥ /
analyzed: yatra viśeṣya aṃśe prakṛta mātra para tā viśeṣaṇa sāmyāt punar aprakṛtaḥ avagamyate sā samāsena saṃkṣepeṇa abhidhānāt samāsoktiḥ
tat etat vyācikhyāsuḥ viṣaya vibhāgāya āha eha prastuta ityādi
ubhayeṣām iti śeṣaḥ
ekatareṣām ita śeṣaḥ
śleṣa nirdeṣa bhgyā iti
viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya aṃśayoḥ śleṣoḥ anibandhane na iti arthaḥ
pṛthak upādānena u iti
viśeṣaṇa aṃśe pṛthak śabda upādānena iti arthaḥ
etat dvi bhedam api vācya tvam śleṣa alaṅkārasya viṣayaḥ

original: yadā purgamyatvaṃ prastutaviṣayaṃ viśeṣaṇasāmyāt tadānīma prastutapraśaṃsā,
analyzed: yadā pur gamya tvam prastuta viṣayam viśeṣaṇa sāmyāt tadānīm a prastuta praśaṃsā
yadā tu aprastuta viṣayam tadā samāsoktiḥ iti vivekaḥ

original: aprastutasya gamyatve yadi viśeṣyasyāpi sāmyaṃ tadā kiṃ syādityata āha-viśeṣyasyāpi sāmye śleṣaprāpteriti /
analyzed: aprastutasya gamya tve yadi viśeṣyasya api sāmyam tadā kim syāt iti atas āha viśeṣyasya api sāmye śleṣa prāpteḥ iti
śleṣa mūla dhvani prātpeḥ iti yāvat

original: nanu śleṣālaṅkāraḥ śabdaśaktimūladhvaniśceti triṣu viṣayeṣvapyasti śliṣṭapadāpanibandhaḥ /
analyzed: nanu śleṣa alaṅkāraḥ śabda śakti mūla dhvaniḥ ca iti triṣu viṣayeṣu api asti śliṣṭa pada apanibandhaḥ

original: tatra yadā śleṣaḥ tadārthadvayasya niyamena vācyatā /
analyzed: tatra yadā śleṣaḥ tadā artha dvayasya niyamena vācya tā

original: vācyatvaṃ caivaṃ saṃbhavati-yadārthau dvāvapi prākaraṇikau staḥ aprākaraṇikau vā tadā viṣeṣaṇaviṣyāṃśayordvayorapi śliṣṭapadopanibandhāt śleṣālaṅkāraḥ
analyzed: vācya tvam ca evam saṃbhavati yadā arthau dvau api prākaraṇikau staḥ a prākaraṇikau vā tadā viṣeṣaṇa viṣya aṃśayoḥ dvayoḥ api śliṣṭa pada upanibandhāt śleṣa alaṅkāraḥ
abhidhāyāḥ aniyantraṇāt dvau api arthau vācyau

original: atha yadaikasya prākaraṇikatvamitarasya aprākaraṇikatvaṃ tadā viśeṣyāṃśe pṛthak śabdopādānabalādeva śleṣālaṅkāraḥ /
analyzed: atha yadā ekasya prākaraṇika tvam itarasya aprākaraṇika tvam tadā viśeṣya aṃśe pṛthak śabda upādāna balāt eva śleṣa alaṅkāraḥ

original: yadi viśeṣyāṃśe 'pi śliṣṭapadopanibandhaḥ tadā prakaraṇaniyantritāyā abhidhāyāḥ prākaraṇikārthaḥ evopakṣayāda prākaraṇikarthāvagatirvyañjanasyaiva  #
analyzed: yadi viśeṣya aṃśe śliṣṭa pada upanibandhaḥ tadā prakaraṇa niyantritāyāḥ abhidhāyāḥ prākaraṇika arthaḥ prākaraṇika arthaḥ prākaraṇika rtha avagatiḥ vyañjanasya eva
viṣayaḥ syāt
yat asamāsoktiḥ tadā
viśeṣaṇa aṃśe artha dvaya pratipādaka śabda upanibandhaḥ viśeṣya aṃśe tu prākaraṇika artha mātra para tā
tadā viśeṣaṇa sāmyāt aprastutasya gamya tvāt ukta lakṣaṇā samāsoktiḥ

original: yadā punaḥ prākaraṇikāprākaraṇikayoḥ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyāṃśe 'pi śliṣṭatā tadā tāvanna samāsoktiḥ viśeṣaṇamātrasāmyalakṣaṇā yataḥ śleṣālaṅkāratvaprātpirapi
analyzed: yadā punar prākaraṇika aprākaraṇikayoḥ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya aṃśe śliṣṭa tā tadā tāvat na samāsoktiḥ viśeṣaṇa mātra sāmya lakṣaṇā yatas śleṣa alaṅkāra tva prātpiḥ api
katham tatra artha dvayasya vācya tā eva lakṣaṇam yatas

original: na hyatra dvayorvācyatopapattiḥ prakaraṇapakṣapātinyā abhidhāyā aprākaraṇiker'the
analyzed: na hi atra dvayoḥ vācya tā upapattiḥ prakaraṇa pakṣapātinyāḥ abhidhāyāḥ a prākaraṇika irthe
sparśa abhāvāt a prākaraṇikasya samanvaya samanantara pratītika tvāt śabda śakti mūlasya
dhvaneḥ śleṣeṇa viṣaya grāsa prasaṅgāt ca
viviktaḥ yam ghaṇṭāpathaḥ dhvani nidarśana rahasya vidām iti alam
atha samāsokti rūpakayoḥ vaidharmyam vivecayati viśeṣaṇa sāmya vaśāt ityādinā
hiḥ hetau
yatas viśeṣaṇa sāmyāt aprastutaḥ ūrthaḥ pratīyate

original: ato viśeṣyāṃśe saṃsparśābhāvādviśeṣyaṃ prakṛtārthaṃ na svena rūpeṇa rūpavantaṃ kartumīṣṭe
analyzed: atas viśeṣya aṃśe saṃsparśa abhāvāt viśeṣyam prakṛta artham na svena rūpeṇa rūpavantam kartum īṣṭe

original: kindu viśeṣaṇāṃśapratītaṃ svavyavahāraṃ viśeṣaṇāṃśapratīte prakṛtārthavyavahāre 'vacchredakatvena samāropayati /
analyzed: kindu viśeṣaṇa aṃśa pratītam sva vyavahāram viśeṣaṇa aṃśa pratīte prakṛta artha vyavahāre vat chredaka tvena samāropayati
tat idam āha prastutā vat średaka tvena pratīyate iti
avaccheka tvāt ca ityādi
vyavahāra samāropaḥ na tu rūpakāt vaidharmyam iti āha avacchedaka tvāt ca ityādi
vyavahāra samāropaḥ na tu rūpa samāropaḥ

original: nanu yadā rūpasamāropaḥ tadā kiṃ syādityata āha-rūpasamāropetyādi /
analyzed: nanu yadā rūpa samāropaḥ tadā kim syāt iti atas āha rūpa samāropa ityādi
avacchrādita tvena kroḍīkṛ tvena
prakṛta rūpa rūpita tvāt aprakṛta rūpeṇa uparañjita tvāt rūpakam eva
vivecitam ca etat yathāyogam pariṇāma alaṅkṛtau
atra avāntaraślokāḥ  aprastutam pratītam ced bhedaka aṃśa eka sāmyataḥ
vyavahāram samāropya prastute nyagbhavati athā
tena aprastuta vṛttānta āropeṇa prastutam svayam
saṃkṣepeṇa ucyate tasmāt samāsoktiḥ iyam matā
syāt viśeṣya aṃśa sāmyam ced prastuta ākāra rūpitam
bhavet aprastutam bhedyam rūpaka alaṅkṛtiḥ tadā
iti
asyāḥ viśeṣa prapañcana artham āha tat ca viśeṣaṇa sāmyam ityādi
sādhāraṇyam ubhayatra pravṛtti nimitta saṃbhavaḥ
aupamya garbha tvam tad garbha samāsa āśrayaṇāt
ittham tad viśeṣaṇa sāmyam tridhā bhavati iti arthaḥ
tridhā
krameṇa udāharaṇāni upoḍha rāgeṇa iti
rāgaḥ sandhyā aruṇimā kāmaḥ ca
tārakā ityatas nakṣatra dṛś antar maṇḍalayoḥ pratipattiḥ
mukham vaktram ca
timiram aṃśukam iva timira sadṛśam aṃśukam ca
lakṣaṇam yojayitum āha atra niśā śaśinoḥ ityādi
nāyakaḥ ca nāyikā ca nāyakau
puṃmān striyā iti ekaśeṣaḥ

original: upoḍharāgatvādiśliṣṭa viśeṣaṇamahinmā khalvatra niśāśaśinau nāyakavyavahāra viśiṣṭau pratīyete /
analyzed: upoḍha rāga tva ādi śliṣṭa viśeṣaṇa mahinmā khalu atra niśā śaśinau nāyaka vyavahāra viśiṣṭau pratīyete

original: nanu katham atra nirjñāyate vyavahārasamāropo na rūpasamāropa ityata āha-aparityaktetyādi /
analyzed: nanu katham atra nirjñāyate vyavahāra samāropaḥ na rūpa samāropaḥ iti atas āha aparityakta ityādi

original: yadi rūpasamāropastadā prakṛtau rūpakanyāyena svaṃ svaṃ rūpamavacchrāditatvena parityajya yadavacchrādakamupamānarūpaṃ tādrūpyamupagṛhṇāti
analyzed: yadi rūpa samāropaḥ tadā prakṛtau rūpaka nyāyena svam svam rūpam avacchrādita tvena parityajya yat avacchrādakam upamāna rūpam tādrūpyam upagṛhṇāti

original: iha punarviśeṣyāṃśe niṣpratiyogikatayā jñātayorata evāparityakta sva rūpayoḥ niśāśaśinorviśeṣaṇasāmyāvagamitena nāyakatvadharmeṇa viśiṣṭatayā  #
analyzed: iha punar viśeṣya aṃśe niṣpratiyogika tayā jñātayoḥ atas eva aparityakta sva rūpayoḥ niśā śaśinoḥ viśeṣaṇa sāmya avagamitena nāyaka tva dharmeṇa viśiṣṭa tayā
pratīteḥ
atas vyavahāra samāropaḥ eva
tanvī iti
puṣpam ārttavam rajaḥ
prasūnam ca

original: iha tanutvādīnāṃ viśeṣaṇānāmubhayatraikārthatāsāmyaṃ na tu śliṣṭatā /
analyzed: iha tanu tva ādīnām viśeṣaṇānām ubhayatra ekārtha tā sāmyam na tu śliṣṭa tā
tat etat āha atra tanu tva ityādi

original: nanu tanutvādidharmasāmyāt kathaṃ latāvyavahārapratītirityata āha-tatra ca lataiketyādi /
analyzed: nanu tanu tva ādi dharma sāmyāt katham latā vyavahāra pratītiḥ iti atas āha tatra ca latā ekā ityādi

original: vikāso hi latāyā eva tatsamāropo lolākṣyā latāvyavahārapratīteḥ kāraṇam /
analyzed: vikāsaḥ hi latāyāḥ eva tad samāropaḥ lola akṣyāḥ latā vyavahāra pratīteḥ kāraṇam
nanu vikāsasya latā eka gāmi tvāt katham sādhāraṇyam iti atas āha vikāsaḥ tu ityādi

original: yathaivaṃ viśeṣaṇasādhāraṇyaṃ dharmasamāropaśca vyavahārasamāropasya kāraṇaṃ tathā kāryasamāropo 'pīti vyutpādayutumāha-evaṃ ca kāryetyādi
analyzed: yathā evam viśeṣaṇa sādhāraṇyam dharma samāropaḥ ca vyavahāra samāropasya kāraṇam tathā kārya samāropaḥ api iti vyutpādayutum āha evam ca kārya ityādi

original: kāryasamāropanibandhano hi bheda iha dharmasamāropanītyā sujñānaḥ upari ca śuddhatvena pṛthagrāśīkariṣyati /
analyzed: kārya samāropa nibandhanaḥ hi bhedaḥ iha dharma samāropa nītyā su jñānaḥ upari ca śuddha tvena pṛthak rāśīkariṣyati
atas iha na udāhṛtaḥ
evamādau dharma kāryayoḥ anyatara āropam antareṇa aprakṛta arthaḥ na avagamyate
prakaraṇa niyantritāyāḥ abhidhāyāḥ prākaraṇika arthaḥ eva upakṣayāt
atas dharma kāryayoḥ anyatara āropaḥ eva vyañjana vyāpāra utthā panena aprakṛta artha avagati hetuḥ
itas viśeṣaṇa sādhāraṇya nibandhanā asamāsoktiḥ nyāya vidām eva vibhakta viṣayā
asphuṭa tvāt tat idam abhisandhāya āha eyat ca ityādi
pūrva apekṣayā śliṣṭa viśeṣaṇa nibandhanā samāsoktiḥ pūrvā tad apekṣayā iti arthaḥ
danta prabhā puṣpa citā iti

original: atrānapekṣitākhyāne vākye śravaṇa samanantarameva dantaprabhāpuṣpacitatvādinā hetunā hariṇekṣaṇāyāḥ suveṣatā pratīyate /
analyzed: atra anapekṣita ākhyāne vākye śravaṇa samanantaram eva danta prabhā puṣpa cita tva ādinā hetunā hariṇa īkṣaṇāyāḥ su veṣa tā pratīyate
atas tadā su veṣa tva lakṣaṇa kārya vaśāt viśeṣaṇānām danta prabhāḥ puṣpāṇi iva iti upamāsa māsa paratvam

original: atha dantaprabhāsadṛśaiḥ puṣpairiti madhyamapadalopi samāsāntarapratyāyitaiḥ puṣpapallavādibhiḥ viśeṣaṇāsāmyadaśāyāṃ latāvyavahārapratītiḥ
analyzed: atha danta prabhā sadṛśaiḥ puṣpaiḥ iti madhyama pada lopi samāsa antara pratyāyitaiḥ puṣpa pallava ādibhiḥ viśeṣaṇa asāmya daśāyām latā vyavahāra pratītiḥ
tat etat avabodhayati atra danta prabhāḥ ityādinā
latā vyavahāra pratītiḥ iti vadatā

original: rūpasamārope tu rūpakamiti pratipāditam yataḥ ataḥ pratīto 'pi rūpakasamāsa iha nyāyato na prāpnoti /
analyzed: rūpa samārope tu rūpakam iti pratipāditam yatas atas rūpaka samāsaḥ iha nyāyataḥ na prāpnoti

original: nanvevamādau prāgupamāsamāsāsasamāśrayaṇanimittaṃ yadi suveṣatvādinā nopāttaṃ tadā kiṃ syādityata āha-atraiva parītetyādinā /
analyzed: nanu evamādau prāk upamā samāsāsa sama āśrayaṇa nimittam yadi su veṣa tva ādinā na upāttam tadā kim syāt iti atas āha atra eva parīta ityādinā
parītā keśapāśa ali vṛndena parigatā
iha danta prabhā puṣpāṇi iva ityādinā kim upamā samāsaḥ

original: uta dantaprabhā eva puṣpāṇītyādiko rūpakasamāsa iti sandehaḥ,
analyzed: uta danta prabhāḥ eva puṣpāṇi ityādikaḥ rūpaka samāsaḥ iti sandehaḥ
upamā rūpakayoḥ sādhaka bādhaka abhāvāt
atas sandeha rūpa saṅkara samāśrayeṇa pūrvam yojanā

original: na ca mantavyaṃ samāsaḥ sandeho papanna iti,
analyzed: na ca mantavyam samāsaḥ iti
sandehasya kavi pratibhā utthā pitasya vicchritti rūpa tvāt
atas saṅkara samāśrayeṇa ādau yojanā

original: atha sandehopaśamakāle dantaprabhāsadṛśaiḥ puṣpairityādi pūrvavadeva madhyamapadalopasamāsaḥ latāvyavahārapratītau samāsoktāveva viśrantiḥ
analyzed: atha sandeha upaśama kāle danta prabhā sadṛśaiḥ puṣpaiḥ ityādi pūrvavat eva madhyama pada lopa samāsaḥ latā vyavahāra pratītau samāsa uktau eva viśrantiḥ

original: itthaṃ ca sati upamā samāsagarbhatayā saṅkarasamāsagarbhatayā ca samāsoktibhedo 'yaṃ dvidhā darśito mantavyaḥ /
analyzed: ittham ca sati upamā samāsa garbha tayā saṅkara samāsa garbha tayā ca samāsokti bhedaḥ yam dvidhā darśitaḥ mantavyaḥ

original: nanu kevalarūpakasamāsāśrayeṇāpi samāsoktibhedo 'yaṃ kiṃ neṣyata ityata āha-rūpakagarbhatvena tviti /
analyzed: nanu kevala rūpaka samāsa āśrayeṇa api samāsokti bhedaḥ yam kim neṣyate iti atas āha rūpaka garbha tvena tu iti

original: prāk rūpakasamāse atha tadgarbhatayopamāsamāsāśraye yadyapi viśeṣaṇasāmyaṃ bhavatyeva,
analyzed: prāk rūpaka samāse atha tad garbha tayā upamā samāsa āśraye yadi api viśeṣaṇa sāmyam bhavati eva
tathā api na tat samāsokteḥ prayojakam
kutas eka deśa vivarti mukhena eva latā vyavahāra pratītau samāsokteḥ vaiyarthyāt

original: nanu upamāsamāse saṅkarasamāse ca samāsoktivaiparthyaṃ kiṃ na syādityāha-na ca prāṅnidarśitetyādi /
analyzed: nanu upamā samāse saṅkara samāse ca samāsokti vaiparthyam kim na syāt iti āha na ca prāk nidarśitā ityādi
eṣa nyāyaḥ samāsokti vaiparthya āpatti lakṣaṇaḥ
tatra hemum āha aupamā saṅkarayoḥ eka deśa vivartinoḥ abhāvāt
na hi upamā alaṅkāraḥ saṅkara aṅkāraḥ ca eka deśa vivarti tvena kenacid anuśiṣṭau
atas svatantra alaṅkāra tva saṃśayāt na anya bādha kṣamau
rūpakam tu eka deśa vivarti tayā anuśiṣṭam anya bādha kṣamam eva

original: ata evaṃvidhe viṣaye rūpakaprātpau samāsokte prātpiriti sodāharaṇaṃ darśayitumāha-taccaikadeśavivartītyādi /
analyzed: atas evaṃvidhe viṣaye rūpaka prātpau samāsokte prātpiḥ iti sa udāharaṇam darśayitum āha tat ca eka deśa vivarti ityādi
nīrakṣya vidyut nayanaiḥ iti

original: payodo vidyunnayanairniśāyāmabhisārikāyāḥ mukhaṃ nirīkṣya dhārānipātaiḥ saha candro mayā vānta iti dhiyevārtataraṃ rarāsetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: payodaḥ vidyut nayanaiḥ niśāyām abhisārikāyāḥ mukham nirīkṣya dhārā nipātaiḥ saha candraḥ mayā vāntaḥ iti dhiyā iva ārtataram rarāsa iti arthaḥ

original: atrāśliṣṭam ekadeśavivartirūpakaṃ samāsokternāvakāśaṃ dadātīti darśayati-atra nirīkṣaṇetyādi /
analyzed: atra āśliṣṭam eka deśa vivarti rūpakam samāsokteḥ na avakāśam dadāti iti darśayati atra nirīkṣaṇa ityādi
nirīkṣaṇam hi puruṣa dharmaḥ na payoda dharmaḥ

original: ataḥ puruṣānusāreṇa yojane vidyuta eva nayanānīti rūpakameva na punarupamā saṅkaro vā /
analyzed: atas puruṣa anusāreṇa yojane vidyutaḥ eva nayanāni iti rūpakam eva na punar upamā saṅkaraḥ vā
atas payode draṣṭṛ puruṣa rūpaṇam arthāt iti

original: taccedamārtataraṃ rarāseti pratīyamānotprekṣāyā eva nimittaṃ samāsokte raprātpireveti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tat ca idam ārtataram rarāsa iti pratīyamāna utprekṣāyāḥ eva nimittam samāsokteḥ raprāt piḥ eva iti bhāvaḥ
maga naṇa neti patrāṇi dalāni tāni eva patrāṇi tāla dalāni
lipayorītayaḥ tāḥ eva lipayo kṣara sanniveśāḥ
kāyasthaḥ dehī gaṇakaḥ

original: eṣu rūpaṇasāmarthyānmadano mahārājatayā madhuśca śrīkaraṇāgraṇītvena rūpitaḥ pratīyate /
analyzed: eṣu rūpaṇa sāmarthyāt madanaḥ mahā rāja tayā madhuḥ ca śrīkaraṇa agraṇī tvena rūpitaḥ pratīyate
tat etat upadarśayati atra hi patra lipi ityādi

original: nanu patrāṇīvetyādirupamā kiṃ na syādityata āha-dvirephamaṣītyādi /
analyzed: nanu patrāṇi iva ityādiḥ upamā kim na syāt iti atas āha dvirepha maṣi ityādi

original: maṣīyogo hi madhāvasaṃbhavannupamā samāsaṃbādhitvā gaṇakavṛtteḥ saṃbhavastadanusāreṇa rūpakasamāsaṃ sādhayatīti yāvat /
analyzed: maṣī yogaḥ hi madhau asaṃbhavan upamā samā saṃbādhitvā gaṇaka vṛtteḥ saṃbhavaḥ tad anusāreṇa rūpaka samāsam sādhayati iti yāvat

original: nanu samāsoktiprastāve kiṃ sodāharaṇaṃ rūpakabhedapradarśanenetyata āha-asya ca pracura ityādi /
analyzed: nanu samāsokti prastāve kim sodāharaṇam rūpaka bheda pradarśanena iti atas āha asya ca pracuraḥ ityādi
asya eka deśa vivarti rūpakasya
atra avāntaraślokau syāt aupamya samāsena samāsoktiḥ viniścaye
syāt saṅkara samāsena samāsasya tu saṃśaye
na rūpaka samāsasya prāt pāvasyāḥ pravartanam
rūpakāt artha saṃsiddheḥ eka deśa vivartinaḥ
atas prabheda antara prathanāya ukta bhedān saṃcaṣṭa itat evam ityādi
iyam khalu śliṣṭāt sādhāraṇāt aupamya garbhā ācyā iti viśeṣaṇa vaicitryāt tridhā uddiṣṭā
tatra śliṣṭāt viśeṣaṇāt ekavidhā
sādhāraṇāt punar dharma samāropa kārya samāropābhyām dvidhā
aupamya garbhāt api upamā samāsena saṅkara samāsena ca iti dvidhā
śliṣṭa aśliṣṭa tayā tu rūpaka samāsa dvayam asyāḥ na viṣayaḥ
atas pañca prakārāḥ

original: itthaṃ viśeṣaṇasāmyātpañcaprakāratvasiddhā vavāntaraṃ viśeṣasahitāmimāṃ punastrirāśikatayā saṃcaṣṭe-itthaṃ śuddhakāryetyādinā /
analyzed: ittham viśeṣaṇa sāmyāt pañca prakāra tva siddhāḥ viśeṣa sahitām imām punar trirāśikatayā saṃcaṣṭe ittham śuddha kārya ityādinā

original: kāryasya śuddhatvaṃ nāma nirūpita viśeṣaṇasāmyā saṃkīrṇatā /
analyzed: kāryasya śuddha tvam nāma nirūpita viśeṣaṇa sāmyā saṃkīrṇa tā
prathamam viśeṣaṇa sāmya nibandhana bheda udayau arvāk iti arthaḥ
atra etat ākūtam viśeṣaṇa sāmyāt aprastutasya gamya tve hi samāsoktiḥ
tat ca viśeṣaṇa sāmyam śuddha kārya samārope sati upacaritam
yathā vilikhati ityādau udāhariṣyamāṇepadye saḥ ekaḥ rāśiḥ

original: yadā punaridamanupacaritaṃ tadā pañcadhodāhṛtam prāk sa dvitīyaḥ /
analyzed: yadā punar idam anupacaritam tadā pañcadhā udāhṛtam prāk sa dvitīyaḥ
ubhaya maya tve tu tṛtīyaḥ rāṣiḥ

original: anupacaritaviśeṣaṇasāmyanibandhanasya nyāyanirbharatvena prāk pradarśanaṃ pañcavidhatvena kṛtamiti /
analyzed: anupacarita viśeṣaṇa sāmya nibandhanasya nyāya nirbhara tvena prāk pradarśanam pañcavidha tvena kṛtam iti
atha tat eva prāk pradarśanam anusmārayati viśeṣaṇa asāmyam ca iti
nanu śuddha kārya samārope viśeṣaṇa sa anyam upacaritam

original: anyadātvanupacaritaṃ anugatamekarūpaṃ tu prayojanaṃ nānupaśyāma ityata āha-sarvatra cātretyādi /
analyzed: anyadātu anupacaritam anugatam ekarūpam tu prayojanam na anupaśyāmaḥ iti atas āha sarvatra ca atra ityādi
eva kāreṇa tad eka prāṇatām samāsokteḥ abhaiprā eti

original: tasya cāturvidhyaṃ darśayati-sa ca laukika ityādi /
analyzed: tasya cāturvidhyam darśayati sa ca laukikaḥ ityādi
vastu jāti guṇa ādi

original: anena ca vyavahārasamāropacāturvidhyena rāśitrayamapi pratyekaṃ caturdhā prathate /
analyzed: anena ca vyavahāra samāropa cāturvidhyena rāśi trayam api pratyekam caturdhā prathate
atas samāsoktiḥ bahu prapañca iti
tatra ādyam rāśim udājihīrṣarā āha tatra śaddha kāryā iti
vilikhati iti
uccairvilekhana
gāḍham kaca grahaḥ patrāvalyām asāmañjasyam aṃśuka vikarṣaḥ haṭhakāḥ muka kāryam
haṭhāt iti kriyāviśeṣaṇam

original: atropacaritatvādaprastutāvagatau viśeṣaṇasāmyaṃ nātibaddhabharam api tu śuddhakāryasamāropa eva ityāha-atra patrāvalītyādi /
analyzed: atra upacarita tvāt aprastuta avagatau viśeṣaṇa sāmyam na ati baddha bharam api tu śuddha kārya samāropaḥ eva iti āha atra patra āvali ityādi
khadire patra āvalī grahaḥ
vyutkrama uktānām krama svārasyāya anusmārayati viśeṣaṇa samyena iti
viśeṣaṇa sāmyam hi yadā śliṣṭa tā tadā ubhaya artha tā
yadā sādhāraṇyam tadā ubhayatra pravṛtti nimitta saṃbhavaḥ
yadā aupamya garbha viśeṣaṇa tā tadā samāsa bhedaḥ iti
viśeṣam asāmya vaśāt eva aprastuta avagatiḥ iti jñeyam
atha ubhaya maya tvena udāharati liḥ lūnāni iti
nīrasaiḥ śuṣkaiḥ ra hṛdayaiḥ ca
kaṇṭakibhiḥ kṣudra śaṅkumadbhiḥ ghātaka jana yogibhiḥ ca
ubhaya maya tām yojayati atra kaṇṭakibhiḥ iti

original: eṣitriṣu rāśiṣu vyavahārasamāropa vaicitryanibandhanāt bhedānupadarśayitukāma āha-vyavahārasamāropetyādi /
analyzed: rāśiṣu vyavahāra samāropa vaicitrya nibandhanāt bhedān upadarśayitu kāmaḥ āha vyavahāra samāropa ityādi
dyām āliliṅga iti
ambaram nabhaḥ vāsaḥ ca
śara tvam dāhena
taruṇaḥ prabalaḥ yuvā ca
atra ambarakara taruṇeṣu viśeṣaṇa sāmyam
anyatra kārya samāropaḥ
atra laukika vastuni laukika vyavahāra samāropaḥ

uktam hi śrīmat gauḍapādauḥ māyā saṅkhyā turīyam iti

asmāt param asti iti vibhāgaḥ
taiḥ tava sakṣaṇam kṛtam manye

original: parameśvarasya hi sarvavṛttiṣvakatvaṃ rūpamavyayatvaṃ asaṃkhyatā na kutaścidapideśakālāderbheda iti idameva lakṣaṇam /
analyzed: parameśvarasya hi sarva vṛttiṣu akatvam rūpam avyaya tvam asaṃkhya tā na kutaścid api deśa kāla ādeḥ bhedaḥ iti idam eva lakṣaṇam
idam āgama śāstra prasiddham vastu

original: atha sarvāsu kārikādivṛttiṣvekatvādisaṃkhyārahitamavyaye hi syāditi pratiyogyekatvaṃ nāsti kiṃ tvabhedaikatvamevar /
analyzed: atha sarvāsu kārikā ādi vṛttiṣu ekatva ādi saṃkhyā rahitam avyaye hi syāt iti pratiyogi ekatvam na asti kim tu abheda ekatvam eva

original: idṛśamavyayaṃ paśyadbhiḥ paratvajuṣaḥ prakṛteḥ paratvalakṣaṇāyāḥ vibhakteḥ prathamāderlopaḥ kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: idṛśam avyayam paśyadbhiḥ paratva juṣaḥ prakṛteḥ paratva lakṣaṇāyāḥ vibhakteḥ prathama ādeḥ lopaḥ kṛtaḥ
idam avyaya lakṣaṇam sadṛśam triṣu liṅgeṣu ityādinā pratipāditam
idam vyākaraṇa aprasiddham vastu
atra viśeṣaṇa asāmyam eva
sīmānam iti
atra nayana sīmā laṅghanena pratyakṣa pramāṇasya aviṣaya tā
anyena asaṅgatyā niyata sambandha abhāvāt anumānasya
vacaḥ sparśa abhāvāt śabdasya laukikasya adṛṣṭa upamāna tayā upamānasya

original: arthādanāpātādarthāpatterna ca na yaditi pramāṇānuktāvapi vastutar idṛśi lāvaṇye mīmāṃsādisiddhādṛṣṭādivastusamāropaḥ /
analyzed: arthāt anāpātāt arthāpatteḥ na ca na yat iti pramāṇa anuktau api vastutas   lāvaṇye mīmāṃsā ādi siddha adṛṣṭa ādi vastu samāropaḥ

sva pakṣa iti

heti sa āyudham hetuḥ liṅgam ca
viśeṣaḥ tiśayaḥ padārtha viśeṣaḥ ca
māna āroṣaḥ pramāṇam ca
mandam agnim iti
atra manda agri śvayathu timira doṣa āvirbhāvaḥ oṣadhipateḥ bhiṣajaḥ sannidhau iti
atra viśeṣya aṃśe sāmyam iti udāharaṇa antaram mṛgyam

original: yadvā candramasa iti viśeṣyādhyāhārādoṣadhipaterityetat viśeṣaṇātayā vivakṣiṇīyam /
analyzed: yat vā candramasaḥ iti viśeṣya adhyāhārāt oṣadhipateḥ iti etat viśeṣaṇātayā vivakṣiṇīyam
prasarpat tātparyaiḥ iti
ye tātparya vidaḥ ye ca anumāna rasikāḥ taiḥ api avi

original: jñeyaścāsau pārimityaṃ jahāti na vaktuṃ śakyaḥ na ca lakṣayituṃ kintu guruvaraḥ /
analyzed: jñeyaḥ ca asau pārimityam jahāti na vaktum śakyaḥ na ca lakṣayitum kintu guru varaḥ
tava sahṛdaya sthaḥ guṇa gaṇaḥ budhaiḥ apūrva vyāpāra guṇa gaṇa antara vyāpāra atiśāyi vyāpāraḥ iti avasitaḥ

original: atra guṇagaṇe śṛṅgārādirasavyavahāraḥ samāropita ityāha-atra bharatetyādi /
analyzed: atra guṇa gaṇe śṛṅgāra ādi rasa vyavahāraḥ samāropitaḥ iti āha atra bharata ityādi
rasam hi bharata upajñam āmananti
vibhāva anubhāva vyabhicāri saṃyogāt rasa niṣpattiḥ iti āmnānāt
tad vyavahāram upapādayati tathā hi atra ityādinā
na tātparya śakti jñeyaḥ iti

original: tātparyaṃ hi nāma abhihitānvayamate samanvayaśaktiḥ abhidhottīrṇā samanvayamātra viśrāntayānayā samanvayasamanantara pratītiko raso na jñāyate
analyzed: tātparyam hi nāma abhihita anvaya mate samanvaya śaktiḥ abhidhā uttīrṇā samanvaya mātra viśrāntayā anayā samanvaya samanantara pratītikaḥ rasaḥ na jñāyate
vibhāva anubhāva vyabhicāri bhās saha niyata sambandha abhāvāt anumānasya api na viṣayaḥ
sākṣātsaṅketāḥ viṣaya tvāt na vācyaḥ

original: mukhyārthabādhādyabhāvannāpi lakṣyaḥ api tu vedyāntaravigalanādaparimitaḥsan abhidhālakṣaṇātātparyottīrṇena
analyzed: mukhya artha bādhā ādi abhāvan na api lakṣyaḥ api tu vedya antara vigalanāt aparimitaḥ san abhidhā lakṣaṇā tātparya uttīrṇena

original: vyañjanākhyena kāvyaikagāminā śāstrāntarāpūrveṇa vyāpāreṇa viṣayīkriyamāṇo laukikatvāt
analyzed: vyañjana ākhyena kāvya eka gāminā śāstra antara apūrveṇa vyāpāreṇa viṣayīkriyamāṇaḥ laukika tvāt

original: anukāryamabhinayaprayāsanighnatvāt anukartāraṃ ca parihṛtya sahṛdayaikagata iti budhairavasīyate /
analyzed: anukāryam abhinaya prayāsa nighna tvāt anukartāram ca parihṛtya sahṛdaya eka gataḥ iti budhaiḥ avasīyate
diś mātram idam
rasamīsāṃsāyām vistaraḥ

original: saṃpradāyaprakāśinyāṃ kāvyaprakāśaṭīkāyāṃ vitatya kṛta iti tata evāvadhārya ityalam /
analyzed: saṃpradāya prakāśinyām kāvyaprakāśa ṭīkāyām vitatya kṛtaḥ iti tatas eva avadhāryaḥ iti alam

original: atraidupahvaram-vāgdevatā hi parā paśyantī madhyamāvaikharī ceti catuṣpadaparimitā /
analyzed: atra ait upahvaram vāgdevatā hi parā paśyantī madhyamā vaikharī ca iti catuṣpada parimitā

original: tatra nāmarūpātmakaṃ prapañcaṃ svātmanyupasaṃhṛtya svarūpajyotīrūpiṇī jāgaritādidhāmatrayollaṅghinī parā /
analyzed: tatra nāma rūpa ātmakam prapañcam sva ātmani upasaṃhṛtya svarūpa jyotī rūpiṇī jāgarita ādi dhāma traya ullaṅghinī parā
nāma rūpa prapañca ullāsanāya prāthamika prāṇa parispanta abhimāninī kandamandirā maṇipūraka avadhi prasarantī
bīja bhāva āpanna nirvibhāga varṇa mayī viśva abhimukhī bhavantī sauṣutpa vṛttiḥ paśyantī

original: pārāyāḥ sakāśāduditā maṇipūrakāt anāhatāvadhi prāṇaparispandotkṣubhitabuddhivṛttyabhimāninī varṇapadādiparigrahāntaḥsaṃjalapātmikā paśyantīprabhāvā  #
analyzed: pārāyāḥ sakāśāt uditā maṇipūrakāt anāhata avadhi prāṇa parispanda utkṣubhita buddhi vṛtti abhimāninī varṇa pada ādi parigraha antar saṃjalapa ātmikā paśyantī prabhāvā  /
svapna vṛttiḥ madhyamā
anāhatāt mukha karandara avadhi prasṛtā a bahis saṃjalpa ātmikā sthūlā madhyama udbhavā a jāgarita vṛttiḥ vaikharī
āsām nāma nirukti ādi viśeṣaḥ prathama śloka vivaraṇe prapañcitaḥ

original: atha saṃhārāvasare jāgaritalayapuraskāreṇa vaikharī madhyamāyāṃ līyate /
analyzed: atha saṃhāra avasare jāgarita laya puraskāreṇa vaikharī madhyamāyām līyate
madhya māyayām līyate
madhyamā svapna laya puraskāreṇa paśyantyām
sā ca sauṣutpalaya puraskāreṇa parāyām

original: itthaṃ ca sati śaktimānātmā parāyāṃ turīyāṃ ,

paśyantyām prājñāḥ

original: tava parayā devyā saha krīḍādṛḍhāliṅgane aprayāsena tādṛśī samādhisāmarasye pravṛtte
analyzed: tava parayā devyā saha krīḍā dṛḍha āliṅgane aprayāsena tādṛśī samādhi sāmarasye pravṛtte

original: bāhyā vāk kathaṃ cāṭūccāraṇācāpalaṃ sphuṭatālvoṣṭhapuṭavyāpāramakhatatāṃ kathaṃ nāma
analyzed: bāhyā vāc katham cāṭu uccāraṇā cāpalam sphuṭa tālu oṣṭha puṭa vyāpāra makha ta tām katham nāma

original: kuto nāstītyata āha-ābhyantarī paśyantī trapayevātmānaṃ yatra tirayati,
analyzed: kutas na asti iti atas āha ābhyantarī paśyantī trapayā iva ātmānam yatra tirayati
madhyama apekṣayā abhyantaratamā sva ātmānam na prakāśayatum īṣṭe
turīya parvaṇi prāṇa anudayāt yatra madhyamā api madhura dhvani ujjihāsā rasāt truṭyati
antar sañjalpa rūpam madhuram api dhvanim na unmūlayati iti arthaḥ
yatra parā samādhau paśāyantī madhyamayoḥ an udayaḥ

original: tatra vaikharī kathaṃ nāma pravartatām iti tātparyārthaḥ /
analyzed: tatra vaikharī katham nāma pravartatām iti tātparyārthaḥ
atra āgama siddhe vastuni laukika vastu vyavahāraḥ śṛṅgāra ātmakaḥ samāropitaḥ

original: yathā parayodevyā paṭṭamahiṣyā saha tava kriḍādṛḍhāliṅgane pravartamāne anyā kācidābhyantarī ābhyantaratvādeva yuvayorāliṅganaṃ paśyantī trapayevātmānaṃ  #

yatra tirayati gopayati
madhyamā api na abhyantarī na ca bāhyā

original: madhyamāvṛttirmadhuradhvaniḥ yathā bhavati tathā ujjihāsārasāt truṭyatiṣa /
analyzed: madhyamā āvṛttiḥ madhura dhvaniḥ yathā bhavati tathā ujjihāsā rasāt

original: tatra bāhyā parigrahaveśyā cāṭūccāraṇacāpalaṃ kathaṃ vitanutāmiti /
analyzed: tatra bāhyā parigraha veśyā cāṭu uccāraṇa cāpalam katham vitanutām iti
atra lakṣaṇa yojanāya āha atra āgama iti

original: śuddhakāryasamārope hi vilikhati kucāvityādau yat kucavilekhanādi ha(ṭha)
analyzed: śuddha kārya samārope hi vilikhati kucau ityādau yat kuca vilekhana ādi haṭha
kāmu

original: kakāryaṃ tasya yadyapi na mukhyatayā yat khadirādiviśeṣaṇatvaṃ,
analyzed: ka kāryam tasya yadi api na mukhya tayā yat khadira ādi viśeṣaṇa tvam
atha api upacāreṇa viśeṣaṇīkaraṇam tat tatra
yathā kathañcid lakṣaṇa yojanā kāryā

original: atha yatra samāsokterasāmañjasyaṃ tatra nyāyasañcāreṇa samañcāreṇa samañjasīkartumāha-iha tvityādinā /

aindram dhanuḥ iti

original: ārdranakhakṣatābham aindraṃ dhanuḥ pāṇḍupayodhareṇa dadhānā sakalaṅkaminduṃ prasādayantī śaradravestāpabhabhyadhikaṃ cakāra /
analyzed: ārdra nakha kṣata ābham aindram dhanuḥ pāṇḍu payodhareṇa dadhānā sa kalaṅkam indum prasādayantī śarad raveḥ tāpa bha abhyadhikam cakāra
payodharaḥ medhaḥ kucaḥ ca
pravṛṣ apekṣayā śaradi raveḥ tāpa ādhikyam
atra carcā astitā vat ityādi
nāyaka tva pratītiḥ asti iti pratijña ghāyā tat ākṣipati na cetra iti
sākukastyā nāyaka tva pratītiḥ asti iti pratijñāya tat ākṣipati na ca atra iti
sā akutastyā nāyaka tva pratītau
hetu sadbhāvam āśaṅkya nirācaṣṭe prasādayanti ityādi
sa kalaṅka prasāda lakṣaṇa viśeṣaṇa sāmyāt nāyikā tva pratītiḥ
nāyaka tva pratītiḥ iti ced manyase
na etat hayate
kutas ārdra nakha kṣata ābham aindram dhanuḥ iti viśeṣaṇasya asāmyāt

original: aindraṃ dhanuḥ śarada evaviśeṣaṇaṃ na nāyikāyāḥ /
analyzed: aindram dhanuḥ śaradaḥ eva viśeṣaṇam na nāyikāyāḥ

original: nanvārdranakhakṣatābhamiti viśeṣaṇaupamyādekadeśavivartinyupamā śaradi tatsāmarthyādinduravyoḥ nāyakatvapratītirastvityata āha-na caikadeśeti
analyzed: nanu ārdra nakha kṣata ābham iti viśeṣaṇa aupamyāt eka deśa vivartinī upamā śaradi tad sāmarthyāt indu ravyoḥ nāyaka tva pratītiḥ astu iti atas āha na ca eka deśa iti
yadi eka deśa vartinī upamā kenacid uktā tadā tad sāmarthyāt anayoḥ nāyaka tva pratītiḥ syāt
na ca iyam uktā kenacid
atas tad sāmarthāt katham anayoḥ nāyaka tva vyavasthitiḥ
atra samādhitsuḥ āha ucyate iti
eka deśa vivartinī ityādi
yadi api sākṣāt na uktā atha api na asyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ sti
nanu ukti pratiṣedhayoḥ dvayoḥ api abhāve katham saṃbhavaḥ iti atas āha samānya lakṣaṇa iti

original: nanu yadyekadeśavivartinyupamāyā iha saṃbhavaḥ tadaryupamālaṅkārasyaiva prātpirma samāsokterityata āha-athātretyādi /
analyzed: nanu yadi eka deśa vivartini upamāyāḥ iha saṃbhavaḥ tad ari upamā alaṅkārasya eva samāsokteḥ iti atas āha atha atra ityādi
atha iti adhikāre
yadi upamāna tvena nāyakaḥ dhi kārī kaścid pratīyate
bhavet prāt piḥ upamā alaṅkārasya
nahi pratīyate kaścid adhikārī
api tu ravi śaśinoḥ eva nāyaka tva vyavahāre pratītiḥ
tayoḥ eva asyām śaradi nāyaka tva upacārāt
ittham samāsa ukti prātpau
tad anusāreṇa śabda nyāsaḥ nyāyyaḥ iti atas āha tat atra ityādi
ārdra nakha kṣate śrutyā āsthitam api upamāna tvam indradhanuṣi saṃcāraṇīyam
kutas vastu paryālocanayā
tām eva vastu paryālocanām sphuṭayati indracāpa ābham ityādi
pratītiḥ padārtha antara samabhivyavahārāt ittham eva yatas

original: anyaniṣṭhasya dharmasyānyatra saṃcāraṇaṃ kutra dṛṣṭamityata āha-yathā dadhnetyādi /
analyzed: anya niṣṭhasya dharmasya anyatra saṃcāraṇam kutra dṛṣṭam iti atas āha yathā dadhnā ityādi

original: dadhnā juhotītyatra hi havanagatatvena vidhiḥ pratītaḥ sa tvagnihotraṃ juhotītya(ta)
analyzed: dadhnā juhoti iti atra hi havana gata tvena vidhiḥ pratītaḥ sa tu agnihotram juhoti iti atas
eva siddhaḥ iti
vastu paryālocanayā yathā dadhni saṃcāyete tathā iha api anusandheyam iti yāvat
atas samāsoktiḥ evā iyam iti nigamayati evam upamā anuprāṇitā iti
aindradhanuṣaḥ upameyasya upamāna tvaṅkḷpteḥ vaivakṣika upamā anuprāṇita tvam

original: atha yatra nyāyataḥ samāsoktimapohya ekadeśavivartinyupamaiva prathate taṃ viṣayaṃ darśayitumāha-iha punariti /
analyzed: atha yatra nyāyataḥ samāsoktim apohya eka deśa vivartinī upamā eva prathate tam viṣayam darśayitum āha eha punar iti
netraiḥ iva iti

original: atra saraḥśriyāṃ nāyikātvapratītau nimittaṃ vivacayati-saraḥ śriyamiti /
analyzed: atra saraḥ śriyām nāyikā tva pratītau nimittam vivacayati saraḥ śriyam iti
viśeṣaṇa sāmyāt nāyikā tva pratītiḥ na samāsoktyā
atas eva vyavahāra samāropaḥ pi na bhavati iti āha tasmāt nāyikā iti
nāyikā api atra saraḥ śriyām upamāna tayā

original: na tu vyavahārasasāropeṇa saraḥśrīdharmatayā ata evaṃvidhe viṣaye gatyantarābhāvādekadeśavivartinī upamaivopāsyā /
analyzed: na tu vyavahāra sa sa āropeṇa saraḥ śrī dharma tayā atas evaṃvidhe viṣaye gati antara abhāvāt eka deśa vivartinī upamā eva upāsyā
anuktā katham upāsyā iti atas āha yaiḥ tu iti
asmābhiḥ tāvat upapattibhiḥ uktā
yaiḥ tu na uktā taiḥ api gati antara abhāvāt upasaṃkhyātavyā eva iti arthaḥ
nanu pūrvam eka deśa vivartinī upamā nirākṛtā

original: samprati sādhiteti vyāghāta ityata āha-yatra tu keśapāśetyādi /
analyzed: samprati sādhitā iti vyāghātaḥ iti atas āha yatra tu keśa pāśa ityādi

original: dantaprabhāḥ puṣpāṇīvetyādi samāsenoktāyāmupamāyāṃ satyāmapi dantaprabhāsadṛśaiḥ puṣpairivetyādi samāsāntaramahimnā viśeṣaṇasāmyamupapadyate
analyzed: danta prabhāḥ puṣpāṇi iva ityādi samāsena uktāyām upamāyām satyām api danta prabhā sadṛśaiḥ puṣpaiḥ iva ityādi samāsa antara mahimnā viśeṣaṇa sāmyam upapadyate
tatra aupamya garbha viśeṣaṇa utthāpitā samāsoktiḥ eva yuktā

original: samprati tu netrairivetyatra gatyantarābhāvādekadeśavivartinyupamaiva vyavasthāpiteti vyaghātābhāvāt sarvamavadātam /
analyzed: samprati tu netraiḥ iva iti atra gati antara abhāvāt eka deśa vivartinī upamā eva vyavasthāpitā iti vyaghāta abhāvāt sarvam avadātam

original: athārthāntaranyāsa prabhāvitāyāmasyāṃ vaicitryāntaraṃ astītyāha - sā cetyādi /
analyzed: atha artha antara nyāsa prabhāvitāyām asyām vaicitrya antaram asti iti āha sā ca ityādi
samarthyaḥ prakṛtaḥ ṛthaḥ samarthakaḥ tu aprakṛtaḥ
atha upagūḍhaḥ iti
upagūḍhe āliṅgite
yayau apagatā
atra samarthya gatā
a samāptā iti
atra tu samarthaka gatā
ubhayatra yojanāya āha atra upagūḍha tvena ityādi

original: upagūḍhatvaṃ śāntataṭitkaṭākṣatvaṃ ca viśeṣaṇasāmyaṃ tadutthāpitayā samāsoktyā nāyakavyavahārapratītiḥ /

original: nanu bhūtabhāvinorbhūtabhāvitvena prakāśane vastuvṛttamātramityata āha-nāpi rāmo 'bhūdityādi /
analyzed: nanu bhūta bhāvinoḥ bhūta bhāvi tvena prakāśane vastu vṛtta mātram iti atas āha nā api rāmaḥ bhūt ityādi
rāmaḥ bhūt iti vastu vṛttānta mātre hi na pratyakṣāyamāṇa tā
iha tu sphuṭasya pratyakṣa tvasya upalambhaḥ
na hi pratyakṣa tvena adhyavasāyāt atiśayoktiḥ iti atas āhana api iyam iti
tatra hetuḥ
anyasya anya tayā iti

original: atiśayoktau hi anyadanyatayā adhyavasīyate iha tu na tathā /
analyzed: atiśayoktau hi anya anya tayā adhyavasīyate iha tu na tathā
bhūte bhāvini
etat upadarśayati na hi bhūta bhāvi iti

original: bhūtam abhūtatvena bhāvina abhāvitvena nā dhyavasīyate /
analyzed: bhūtam abhūta tvena bhāvinaḥ abhāvi tvena nā dhyavasīyate
etad viparyayaḥ pi na asti iti āha abhūta bhāvi iva iti

original: yañcātra pratyakṣatvaṃ tadapyanyathā adhyavasīyate ityāha-na cāpīti /
analyzed: yat ca atra pratyakṣa tvam tat api anyathā adhyavasīyate iti āha na ca api iti
viparyayaḥ pi na asti iti āha apratyakṣam vā iti

original: nanubhūtabhāvinoḥ apratyakṣayoḥ pratyakṣāyamāṇatvam anyathādhyavasāya ityata āha-na hi pratyakṣatvamiti /
analyzed: nanu bhūta bhāvinoḥ apratyakṣayoḥ pratyakṣāyamāṇa tvam anyathā adhyavasāyaḥ iti atas āha na hi pratyakṣa tvam iti
yadi pratyakṣa tvam kevala valaḥ tu dharmaḥ tadā bhūta bhāvinoḥ apratyakṣa tā
vartamānasya tu pratyakṣa tvam iti bhavet vyavasthā
na hi pratyakṣa tvam kevala vastu dharmaḥ
kim tarhi pratipattṛ apekṣayā eva pratyakṣasya iti vastu dharma tā

original: na hi pratipattāramanapekṣya vastuni pratyakṣatā nāma kācit /
analyzed: na hi pratipattāram an apekṣya vastuni pratyakṣa tā nāma kācid
atra prāmāṇika saṃvādāya āha yat cat āhuḥ ityādi
yaḥ hi arthaḥ sva grahaka pratipattuḥ jñāna prakāśam sva anvaya vyatirekau anukārayati
svayam asti ced jñāna pratibhāsaḥ sti
na asti ced na asti iti vyavasthāpayati
sa pratyakṣaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: ataḥ pratyakṣatvaṃ na kevalaṃ vastudharmaḥ pratipattustu sāmagrī tatra upayujyata ityāha-kevralamiti /
analyzed: atas pratyakṣa tvam na kevalam vastu dharmaḥ pratipattuḥ tu sāmagrī tatra upayujyate iti āha kevralam iti

original: asāmagrīke pratipattari na vastu pratyakṣībhavatītyetāvadvaktuṃ śakyate /
analyzed: asāmagrīke pratipattari na vastu pratyakṣībhavati iti etāvat vaktum śakyate
na tu pekṣā iti bhāvaḥ
tām sāmagrīm vivecayati sā ca iti

original: lokayātrāyāṃ laukikārthaṃ pratyakṣīkaraṇe deśakālādivyavadhānādatīndriyer'the yoginām aikāgṣātmakabhāvanārūpā /
analyzed: lokayātrāyām laukika artham pratyakṣīkaraṇe deśa kāla ādi vyavadhānāt atīndriya irthe yoginām aikāgṣa ātmaka bhāvanā rūpā
sākṣātkaraṇa sāmagrī yojayati sā ca iti

original: ) atyadbhutāni hi vastūni ādarapratyayena hṛdi sandhāryamāṇāni tathā bhāvanāṃ prayojayanti /
analyzed: ati adbhutāni hi vastūni ādara pratyayena hṛdi sandhāryamāṇāni tathā bhāvanām prayojayanti

original: itthaṃ ca satilikayātrāyāṃ vartamānārthasākṣātkaraṇasāmagrī cakṣurādiryogināṃ kāvyatattvavidāṃ cātītānāgatārthasākṣātkaraṇabhāvanā /
analyzed: ittham ca sa tilika yātrāyām vartamāna artha sākṣātkaraṇa sāmagrī cakṣuḥ ādiḥ yoginām kāvya tattva vidām ca atīta anāgata artha sākṣātkaraṇa bhāvanā

original: ato yogivat kāvyatattvavidāmatītārthasākṣātkāro nānyathādhyavasāya iti nātiśayoktiḥ śaṅkyā /
analyzed: atas yogi vat kāvya tattva vidām atīta artha sākṣātkāraḥ na anyathā adhyavasāyaḥ iti na atiśayoktiḥ śaṅkyā

original: nanu pratyakṣatayaiva pratīyante bhūtabhāvina iti pratīyamānotprekṣā kiṃ na syādityata āha-nāpi bhūtabhāvināmiti /

tatra hetuḥ tasya abhimāna iti
abhimānaḥ saṃbhāvanā tad rūpasya adhyavasāyaḥ iti utprekṣāyāḥ lakṣaṇam
na hi atra apratyakṣam pratyakṣa tayā saṃbhāvyate
kim tarhi pratyakṣam dṛśyate
atas na utprekṣā
anutprekṣā tve gamaka antaram āha na api vastu iti

original: padārthagato hi ivārthaḥ upamāyāḥ prayojako notprekṣātve gamakāntaramāha-nāpi vastviti /
analyzed: padārtha gataḥ hi iva arthaḥ upamāyāḥ prayojakaḥ na utprekṣā tve gamaka antaram āha na api vastu iti

original: padārthagato hi ivārthaḥ upamāyāḥ prayojako notprekṣāyāḥ /

utprekṣā hi abhimāna rūpā pratipattṝ dharmaḥ

original: tasmādabhimānagocara eva ivārthaṃ utprekṣāprayojaka iti bhāvaḥ /

atra saṃvādāya āha yat āhuḥ ityādi
