original: nanu pratipattṝdharmo 'dhyavasāyastarhi prayoktuḥ kaveḥ na syādityata āha-kāvyaviṣaye ceti /
analyzed: nanu pratipattṛ dharmaḥ dhyavasāyaḥ tarhi prayoktuḥ kaveḥ na syāt iti atas āha kāvya viṣaye ca iti
kaviḥ api khalu kāvye sahṛdayaḥ eva
atas na iyam utprekṣā
nanu adbhuta darśanāt pratyakṣa tvam iha iti kāvya liṅgam iti atas āha na api atyadbhuta iti
ati adbhuta padārtha sākṣātkāraḥ hi pratyakṣāyamāṇa tve hetuḥ
akāvya liṅga tve hetum āha liṅga liṅgī iti
hetu tve sati api liṅga liṅgi bhāvena nā iha pratītiḥ
tathātve pārokṣyam prasajet iti bhāvaḥ
katham tarhi pratītiḥ iti atas āha yogi vat iti
nanu ati adbhuta tva hetukā sa camatkāra pratītiḥ iha puras sphurati iva
tyadbhuta tva hetukaḥ rasavat alaṅkāraḥ eva iti atas āha na api ayam iti
tatra hetuḥ rati ādi iti
paripāṭyā api sa camatkāra pratīteḥ puras sphuraṇā sādhāraṇī
atha api na bhāvika rasavatoḥ abhedaḥ
kutas rati hāsa ādi cittavṛttīnām tad anurañjita tvena vibhāva anubhāva vyabhicāriṇām ca

original: yadā paramādvaitajñānivat mamaiva śatrorevetyādiviśeṣaparihārāt sādhāraṇyena hṛdayasaṃvādinī
analyzed: yadā parama advaita jñāni vat mama eva śatroḥ eva ityādi viśeṣa parihārāt sādhāraṇyena hṛdaya saṃvādinī
pratītiḥ tadā eva rasavataḥ bhāvaḥ

original: vibhānādīn rasavatprastutau vivecayiṣyena hṛdayasaṃvādinī pratītiḥ tadaiva rasavato bhāvaḥ /

analyzed: vibhāva ādīn rasavat prastutau vivecayiṣyāmaḥ

original: iha tubhūtabhāvināṃ pratītirna sādhāraṇyena apitu pratipattuḥ tāṭsthyena /
analyzed: iha tu bhūta bhāvinām pratītiḥ na sādhāraṇyena apitu pratipattuḥ tāṭsthyena

original: yathā sāṅkhyādisiddhānāṃ bhede na sarvaṃ jānatāṃ pratītiḥ /
analyzed: yathā sāṅkhya ādi siddhānām bhede na sarvam jānatām pratītiḥ
nanu tāṭasthyena pratītau atīta ādi sphuṭa tvam hetuḥ
sphuṭa pratītiḥ ca pramukhe niṣpattau tu sādhāraṇya pratītiḥ eva
atas katham bhāvikam iti atas āha sphuṭa pratipatti iti
sphuṭa pratipatti nimittaka sphuṭa pratīti utthāpita bhāvika hetukaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: “munirjayati“tyādau hi kumbhasambhavādivṛttamādau tāṭasthyena atītādirūpatayā pratīyate tadaiva bhāvikasiddhiḥ /
analyzed: muniḥ jayati tyādau hi kumbha sambhava ādi vṛttam ādau tāṭasthyena atīta ādi rūpa tayā pratīyate tadā eva bhāvika siddhiḥ

original: athoktarakālaṃ pratipattṝpratīteḥ tādrūpyāpattyā vibhāvādīnāṃ sādhāraṇye rasavān bhāvikahetukaḥsyāt /

na ca etāvatā bhāvika apalāpaḥ śakyate iti yāvat
nanu iha sundara vastu svabhāvaḥ ced na varṇyeta tatas tad apratyakṣāyamāṇa tā

original: svabhāvokterhi laukikānāmeva vastūnāṃ yaḥsūkṣmo dharmaḥ prekṣāvatpratibhaika samadhigamyastasya varṇane hṛdayasaṃvādaḥsādhāraṇyena /

iha punar ati adbhuta tvena alaukikānām vastūnām pratītiḥ taṭastha tayā
atas hṛdaya saṃvāda atiriktānām aṃsānām vailakṣaṇyam

original: yadi laukikavastupratīteḥspuṭatvaṃ tadā kiṃ syādityata āha-kvacittviti /

original: hṛdayasaṃvādasādhāraṇyāt svābhāvoktirasavatoryo 'yamabhedaḥ prasaṅgātpratītastatra vivecayati-na ca hṛdayasaṃvādeti /

original: svabhāvoktau rasavati ca yadyapi sādhāraṇyena hṛdayasaṃvādaḥsacetasāṃ,

original: satyapi sādhāraṇye vastusvabhāvasya saṃvādaḥ svabhāvoktau rasavati tu cittavṛtteḥ /

samāveśaḥ saṅkaraḥ

original: harṣacaritaprāraṃbhe hi devīṃ sarasvatīṃ abhiśatpavate krodhamunaye kruddhānāṃ vedānāṃ svarūpam upavarṇitam /
analyzed: harṣa carita prāraṃbhe hi devīm sarasvatīm abhiśatpavate krodhamunaye kruddhānām vedānām sva rūpam upavarṇitam
yathā roṣa vimukta vetrāsanaiḥ oṅkāra mukhara mukhaiḥ utkṣepa ḍolāyamāna jaṭā bhāra bhari
tad digbhiḥ parikara bandha bhramita kṛṣṇājina paṭa chrāyā śyāmāyamāna divasaiḥ amarṣani
śvāsa ḍolā preṅkholita brahma yokaiḥ soma rasam iva sveda visara vyājena stravadbhiḥ agrihotra pavitra bhāsma smera lalāṭa paṭṭa kuśa tantu cīvarībhiḥ āṣāḍhibhiḥ
praharaṇīkṛta daṇḍa kamaṇḍalu maṇḍalaiḥ mūrtaiḥ catur vedaiḥ iti
yojanāya āha atra hi pratyakṣam iva iti

original: nanu varṇānāvaśāt pratyakṣāyamāṇatvaṃ kiṃ bhāvikaviṣayaḥ āhosvidanubhāvaviśeṣātpratyakṣāyamāṇasya sato varṇanamityata āha-ayaṃ tvatretyādi
analyzed: nanu varṇa anā vaśāt pratyakṣāyamāṇa tvam kim bhāvika viṣayaḥ āhosvit anubhāva viśeṣāt pratyakṣāyamāṇasya sataḥ varṇanam iti atas āha ayam tu atra ityādi
leśaḥ iti alpa avaśiṣṭa tā āha varṇa anā vaśāt iti
bhaṇiti māhātmyam āviṣkaroti pratta yakṣāyamāṇasya eva iti
bhaṇiti māhātmya nairapekṣyeṇa nija anubhāva viśeṣāt eva pratyakṣāyamāṇa tvam anusandhatte
an ātapatraḥ pi iti
atra sita ātapatraiḥ iva vṛta tvam acāmarasya api bāla vyajanena eva upalakṣita tvam

original: anubhāvaviśeṣādeva pratyakṣāyamāṇatvaṃ varṇyate na tu varṇanāvaśātpratyakṣāyamāṇatā /
analyzed: anubhāva viśeṣāt eva pratyakṣāyamāṇa tvam varṇyate na tu varṇanā vaśāt pratyakṣāyamāṇa tā

original: itthaṃ viṣayadvaye avasthite bhāvikam ekatraivetyāha-atra prathamaprakāreti /
analyzed: ittham viṣaya dvaye avasthite bhāvikam ekatra eva iti āha atra prathama prakāra iti

original: na prakārāntaragocara iti yaduktaṃ tatra hetuḥ - kavisamarpitānāmiti /
analyzed: na prakāra antara gocaraḥ iti yat uktam tatra hetuḥ kavi samarpitānām iti

original: ye hi kavinā pratibhayā samarpyante mukhādau candratvakamalatvādayo dharmāsteṣāmevāṅkalāratvam /
analyzed: ye hi kavinā pratibhayā samarpyante mukha ādau candra tva kamala tva ādayaḥ dharmāḥ teṣām eva aṅkalāra tvam
na tu paramārthataḥ sanni viśiṣṭānām himāṃśu lāvaṇya ādīnām

original: ato dvitīyaprakāre pratyakṣāyamāṇatvaṃ vastusanniveśīti na bhāvikālaṅkāraḥ /
analyzed: atas dvitīya prakāre pratyakṣāyamāṇa tvam vastu sanniveśi iti na bhāvika alaṅkāraḥ
yukti antareṇa api draḍhayitum āha api ca śabda anākula tā ityādi

original: cakārādabhūtabhāvitvādayaḥ śabdānākulatā ceti hetavo bhāmahānuśāsane udbhaṭalakṣaṇe
analyzed: cakārāt abhūta bhāvi tva ādayaḥ śabda an ākula tā ca iti hetavaḥ bhāmaha anuśāsane udbhaṭa lakṣaṇe
ca an ākula tva rūpam yat etat vyasta sambandha rahita śabda samarpita tvam pratyakṣāyamāṇā tva pratipādakam uktam
tat katham prayojakībhavet
vastumat niveśi dharma gata tvena api bhāvika saṃbhave niṣpra yojanam eva syāt
atas na dvitīya prakāre bhāvikam iti nigamayati tasmāt vāstavam eva ityādi

original: atra uttare prakāre nanu vāstave 'pi saundarye laukikatayā mā bhūdvicchittiḥ /
analyzed: atra uttare prakāre nanu vāstave saundarye laukika tayā mā bhūt vicchittiḥ

original: kaveḥ kakavinibandhasya vā vaktuḥ nibandhavaśādastyeva sakalavyavahartṛgocarībhātatā durapahnavāvicchittiḥ /
analyzed: kaveḥ ka kavi nibandhasya vā vaktuḥ nibandha vaśāt asti eva sakala vyavahartṛ gocarībhāta tā durapahnavā avicchittiḥ

original: tatra kuto na bhāvikamityata āha-yadi tu vāstavamapītyādinā /
analyzed: tatra kutas na bhāvikam iti atas āha yadi tu vāstavam api ityādinā

original: yadi vastusanniveśyapi saundaryanibandhavaśāt savicchittikaṃ prāñca ācāryāḥ svabhāvoktivadalaṅkāratayā
analyzed: yadi vastu sanniveśi api saundarya nibandha vaśāt sa vicchittikam prāñcaḥ ācāryāḥ svabhāva ukti vat alaṅkāratayā

original: varṇayeyuḥ tadā ayamapi vāstavasaundaryaviṣayatayā samāśaṅkito bhāvikaprakāro nātīva
analyzed: varṇayeyuḥ tadā ayam api vāstava saundarya viṣaya tayā samāśaṅkitaḥ bhāvika prakāraḥ na atīva
duḥśliṣṭe eva satyām sāmagyām
ayam iha āśayaḥ yathā hi svabhāva uktiḥ vāstava saundarya avalambinī vastu svabhāva saukṣmyāt

original: sādhāraṇyena sacotanasaṃvādācca vicchittimatī varṇitā tathaiva vāstavasaundaryāvalambitayā
analyzed: sādhāraṇyena sa cotana saṃvādāt ca vicchittimatī varṇitā tathā eva vāstava saundarya avalambi tayā
nibandhāḥ dvi chitti viśeṣaḥ yam alaṅkāra tayā varṇanīyaḥ eva

original: tathā ca satibhūtabhāvitvādi sāmagrīsadbhāve 'nyakalpanāgauravādayamapi bhāvikaprakāra iti unmīlanaṃ yogyatayā suśakameva /
analyzed: tathā ca sati bhūta bhāvi tva ādi sāmagrī sadbhāve ni akalpana agauravāt ayam api bhāvika prakāraḥ iti unmīlanam yogyatayā su śakam eva

original: unmīlitā ścollekhabhāvodayasandhiśabalatādaya atiprathana svātantrye 'pi cirantanasamayavyatikramaḥ syāditi /
analyzed: unmīlitāḥ svātantrye cirantana samaya vyatikramaḥ syāt iti
amum eva āśayam āviścikīrṣuḥ abhiyukta saṃvādāya āha ata eva ityādi

original: bhūtabhāvinaḥ pratyakṣā iva yatra kriyante ityetāvadeva bhāvikalakṣaṇamakāri yaiḥ khalu tairaśabdānākulatvādiva lakṣaṇatvenoktam /
analyzed: bhūta bhāvinaḥ pratyakṣāḥ iva yatra kriyante iti etāvat eva bhāvika lakṣaṇam akāri yaiḥ khalu taiḥ aśabda anākulatvāt iva lakṣaṇa tvena uktam
na api vā vastu sanniveśinaḥ
saundra ryasya nibandhāt vicchittiḥ svabhāva ukti tulya naya śālinī alaṅkāra tvena prasiñjitā

original: ato bhūtabhāvipratyakṣavadbhāvikalakṣaṇasya bhāvikasya śabdānākulatvavāstava saundaryāvalambenāpi bhāvikaprabhedo 'bhyanujñāyate /
analyzed: atas bhūta bhāvi pratyakṣa vat bhāvika lakṣaṇasya bhāvikasya śabda an ākula tva vāstava saundarya avalambena api bhāvika prabhedaḥ bhyanujñāyate
yatas ittham svabhāva ukti pratiyogi tayā mīmāṃsā pravartayitavyā
atas samprati saṅgatim āha svabhāva uktyā kiñcid iti
vāstava saundarya tvam sādṛśyam
tat ca laukika tva sūkṣma tva sphuṭa tva sādhāraṇya tāṭasthya pratīttaya ādibhiḥ vaidharmya prācuryāt alpakam iti abhisandhāya uktam kiñcid iti

original: satyapi sādṛśyaṃ kiñcinmātraṃ athāpi nyāyasañcārāyehāsmābhiḥ lakṣaṇamasya kṛtam /
analyzed: sati api sādṛśyam kiñcid mātram atha api nyāya sañcārāya iha asmābhiḥ lakṣaṇam asya kṛtam
yaḥ yam pratyakṣa vat bhāvaḥ tu atīta anāgata arthayoḥ
tad bhāva bimbanāt citte viniveśāt ca bhāvikam
na aviparyayataḥ bhrāntiḥ sākṣāt tvāt na itivṛttakam
anya tva anadhyavasiteḥ na ca atra atiśayokti tā
na param vartamāna artham dharmaḥ pratyakṣa tā iṣyate
kṣāyām pratyakṣa tva parikṣayāt
pratyakṣa tve ca sāmagrī bhāvanā adbhuta vastu jā
pratta yakṣa tvam na saṃbhāvyam iha nā utprekṣaṇam tatas
aliṅga liṅga bhāvāt ca kāvya liṅgam na ca iṣyate
tāṭasthyāt sphuṭa saṃvitteḥ na tadā rasa vat bhramaḥ
paścāt sādhāraṇībhāve rasavān tad nimittakaḥ
sphuṭa tvāt nara svabhāva uktiḥ loka uttīrṇasya vastunaḥ
svabhāva ukteḥ rasavataḥ bhedaḥ saṃvāda bhedataḥ
na prasāda guṇaḥ ca etat yasyāt auttarakālikam
vāstave pi hi saundarye yogya tvāt asya sambhavaḥ
cirantana anurodhāt tu tathā vyaktam na kīrtitam
bhāvike buddhi saṃvādaḥ mayā syāt yadi
vyākhyā śilpasya nikaṣaḥ sa me dhīmān bhaviṣyati
udāttāya sūtram
mad hastu varṇanam udāttam
samṛddhimataḥ vastunaḥ kavi pratibhā utthāpitaiḥ carya varṇanam udātta alaṅkāraḥ
sa saṅgatikam vyācaṣṭe svabhāva uktau ityādinā
yathā avasthita tvam laukika tvam
avasaraḥ prātpiḥ
muktāḥ
saṃmārjanībhiḥ prāṅkāṇā sīmni kṛtāḥ yat karṣanti iti vākya artha parāmarśaḥ
yat etat karṣaṇam tat tyāga līlāyitam iti arthaḥ
udāttam tu samṛddhasya vastunaḥ kavi varṇanam
udātta antarāya sūtram
aṅga bhūta mahāpuruṣa caritam ca
pūrvam aiśvarya yoge udātta tvam
iha punaścaritasya udātta tvam
ataḥśabda sāmyāt saṅgatiḥ
tat etat āha audātta śabda ityādi
tat idam iti atra araṇyam tad vṛttāntaḥ pātādaṅgī
yad vṛtta antaḥpātāt rāma caritam aṅgam
tat etat āha atra araṇye iti
asya ca iha kīrtanam darśana antara anusāreṇa
dhvani darśane tu dvitīya udātta viṣaye rasavat ādayaḥ eva
vivecayiṣyate ca etat
aṅgi antare ṅga tā āpannam mahat carita lakṣaṇam
dvitīya udātta viṣayaḥ rasavat ādibhiḥ
rasavat ādi artham sūtram
rasa bhāva tad ābhāsa tad praśamānām nibandhe rasavat preyaḥ ūrjasva samāhitāni
vibhāva ādibhiḥ abhivyañjita urati ādi bhāvaḥ rasaḥ

original: tathā vibhāvānubhāvaiḥ sūcitā vyabhicāriṇaḥ devatāviṣayā ratiśca bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tathā vibhāva anubhāvaiḥ sūcitāḥ vyabhicāriṇaḥ devatā viṣayāḥ ratiḥ ca bhāvaḥ
tau eva aviṣaya pravṛttau ābhāsau
prayāsyat avasthā tu praśamaḥ

original: eṣāṃ caturṇāmupanibandhe paripāṭyā rasavān preyaḥ ūrjasvi samāhitamiti alaṅkārā iti sūtrārthaḥ /
analyzed: eṣām caturṇām upanibandhe paripāṭyā rasavān preyaḥ ūrjasvi samāhitam iti alaṅkārāḥ iti sūtra arthaḥ
sa saṅgatikam vyācaṣṭe udātte mahāpuruṣa ityādinā
tad alaṅkārāṇām cittavṛtti vicchitti ātmanām alaṅkārāṇām iti arthaḥ
atas eva iti
cittavṛtti ātmānaḥ atas samāna yogakṣema tayā yugapad eka sūtra kroḍīkāreṇa lakṣitāḥ
rasa svarūpam vivecayati tatra vibhāvā iti

original: ratihāsaśokādīnāṃ vāsanātmanāṃ sthāyibhāvānāṃ yāni loke kāryakāraṇasahakārīṇi tāni
analyzed: rati hāsa śoka ādīnām vāsanā ātmanām sthāyi bhāvānām yāni loke kārya kāraṇa sahakārīṇi tāni

original: kāvye sandṛbdhāni nāṭye cābhinītāni guṇālaṅkāramahimnā caturvidhābhinayamahimnā ca
analyzed: kāvye sandṛbdhāni nāṭye ca abhinītāni guṇa alaṅkāra mahimnā caturvidha abhinaya mahimnā ca
vibhāvanāḥ danubhāvanāt viśiṣya ābhimukhya caraṇāt ca vibhāva anubhāva vyabhicāriṇāḥ uccante

original: taiḥ prakāśito vyañcito ratyādiḥ sāmājikacittavṛttiviśeṣaḥ śṛṅgārādiko rasa iti dik /
analyzed: taiḥ prakāśitaḥ vyañcitaḥ rati ādiḥ sāmājika cittavṛtti viśeṣaḥ śṛṅgāra ādikaḥ rasaḥ iti diś
iha an upayogāt na prapañcyate
bhāva svarūpam āha bhāvaḥ vibhāva ityādi
vibhāva anubhāvābhyām iti
vyabhicāri vyañjane vyabhicāri antara abhāvaḥ vyañjitaḥ

original: vibhāvānubhāvābhyāṃ vyañjito vyabhicāri vākyārthībhāvadaśāyāṃ bhāva ucyate /
analyzed: vibhāva anubhāvābhyām vyañjitaḥ vyabhicāri vākya arthībhāva daśāyām bhāvaḥ ucyate
saḥ u pi trayastriṃśat bhedaḥ
nirveda glāni ādi rūpa tayā

original: tathā kāntāvyatirikte devatādiviṣaye vyañjito ratyādirapi bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tathā kāntā vyatirikte devatā ādi viṣaye vyañjitaḥ rati ādiḥ api bhāvaḥ
tasmāt vūyabhicāri sthāyī ātmaka tayā bhāvaḥ dvijātikaḥ vagantavyaḥ
yat āha ratiḥ deva ādi viṣayā vyabhicārī tathā añjitaḥ
bhāvaḥ proktaḥ
ābhāsayoḥ svarūpam āha tad ābhāsaḥ rasa ityādi
tad śabdena rasa bhāva pratyavamarśaḥ
ābhāsībhāvaḥ tu aviṣaya pravṛtti ānaucityāt
bhāva praśama svarūpam āha tad praśamaḥ ukta ityādi
ukta bhāva prakārāṇām nivṛttau prayāsyat avasthā bhāva praśamaḥ ucyate

original: nanu rase 'pi praśamaḥ kiṃ nocyate ityata āha-tatrāpītyādi /
analyzed: nanu rase pi praśamaḥ kim nā ucyate iti atas āha tatra api ityādi

original: rasasya hi akhaṇḍanirantarāyapratīti carvaṇīyasya paramaviśrāntirūpatvāt madhye prayāsya davasthā durlakṣyeti rasavyatiriktapariśiṣṭabhedaviṣayo  #
analyzed: rasasya hi carvaṇīyasya parama viśrānti rūpa tvāt madhye durlakṣyā iti rasa vyatirikta pariśiṣṭa bheda viṣayaḥ
yam praśamaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ
eṣām ca rasa bhāva ādīnām upanibandhe paripāṭyāḥ rasavat ādayaḥ laṅkārāḥ
catvāri api lakṣya padāni nirvakti rasaḥ vidyate ityādinā

original: yatra hi vyañjanopaskṛte 'rbhidhādivyāpārātmani nibandhe raso 'sti tadrasavat /
analyzed: yatra hi vyañjana upaskṛteḥ ṛbhidhā ādi vyāpāra ātmani nibandhe rasaḥ sti tat rasavat
priyatara nibandhanam eva preyaḥ jñeyam
ūrjaḥ balam tat yogi nibandhanam eva ūrjasvi

original: nanu nibandhane balaṃ nāma kimityata āha-anaucityeti /
analyzed: nanu nibandhane balam nāma kim iti atas āha anaucitya iti
rasasya anaucityena pravṛtta tvāt daurbalyam
nibandhane tu tad upakṛte bala yogaḥ
samāhitaḥ parihāraḥ

original: kasya? prakṛtatvāduktasya bhāvabhedasya yasya praśama ityapi paryāyaḥ /
analyzed: kasya prakṛta tvāt uktasya bhāva bhedasya yasya praśamaḥ iti api paryāyaḥ

original: nanu rasavadādinā dvitāyodāttasya ca kā kakṣyetyata āha-tatra yasminnityādi /
analyzed: nanu rasavat ādinā dvitāya udāttasya ca kā kakṣyā iti atas āha tatra yasmin ityādi

original: yatra hi bhāmahādidarśane vākyārthībhāvāt pradhānabhūtā eva rasādayo rasavadādyalaṅkārāḥ tatra aṅgabhūtarasādiviṣaya upapadyate /
analyzed: yatra hi bhāmaha ādi darśane vākya arthībhāvāt pradhāna bhūtāḥ eva rasa ādayaḥ rasavat ādi alaṅkārāḥ tatra aṅga bhūta rasa ādi viṣayaḥ upapadyate
kalpaḥ dvitīyaḥ udātta alaṅkāraḥ

original: yasmiṃmastu rasavadādiralaṅkāro aṅgabhūtarasādiviṣaya eva aṅginastu rasāderalaṅkāryabhāvāpannasya
analyzed: rasavat ādiḥ alaṅkāraḥ aṅga bhūta rasa ādi viṣayaḥ eva aṅginaḥ tu rasa ādeḥ alaṅkārya bhāva āpannasya
rasa bhāva ādi dhvani rūpa tayā vyātpa tvāt tatra dhava nidarśane dvitīyasya aṅga bhūta mahāpuruṣa carita lakṣaṇasya udātta alaṅkārasya
viṣayaḥ na avaśiṣyate
kutas iti atas āha tad viṣayasya iti
iyam iha prakriyā
yatra rasa ādayaḥ vākya arthī

original: bhūtāḥ tatra rasavadādayo 'laṅkārā ityalaṅkāramātrarasikānāṃ bhāmahādīnāṃ darśane /
analyzed: bhūtāḥ tatra rasavat ādayaḥ laṅkārāḥ iti alaṅkāra mātra rasikānām bhāmaha ādīnām darśane
yadā tu a vākya arthībhāvāt aṅga bhūtaḥ rasa ādiḥ
tadā aṅga bhūta mahāpuruṣa carita lakṣaṇaḥ dvitīyaḥ udāttaḥ upapadyate nāma

original: dhvanidarśane tu kāvyātmano rasādeḥ prādhānyadaśāyāṃ alaṅkāryatvādalaṅkārabhāvānupapattau aṅgabhūtā rasādayo rasavadādyalaṅkārāḥ /
analyzed: dhvani darśane tu kāvya ātmanaḥ rasa ādeḥ prādhānya daśāyām alaṅkārya tvāt alaṅkāra bhāva anupapattau aṅga bhūtāḥ rasa ādayaḥ rasavat ādi alaṅkārāḥ

original: tathā ca sati rasabhāvādināyakamahāpuruṣacaritāvirbhāvo 'pi rasabhāvādyaṅgabhāvānatirekī vyaṅgyavyañjakamanbandhāt /
analyzed: tathā ca sati rasa bhāva ādi nāyaka mahāpuruṣa carita āvirbhāvaḥ pi rasa bhāva ādi aṅga bhāva an atirekī vyaṅgya vyañjaka manbandhāt
vyañjakam hi mahāpuruṣa caritam
vyaṅgyam rasa bhāva ādi
vyaṅgya bhāva avinābhūta aṅgabhāvam rasa vat alaṅkārasya eva viṣayaḥ
vyañjaka mātra viśrāntānām an avagāḍha dhiyām dvitīya udātta bhramaḥ iti

original: kiṃ hāsyeneti-svapnadṛṣṭa nāyakaṃ svarūpasandarśananihnavaparihāsapravṛttaṃ manyamānasya ripustrījanasyoktivarṇanam /
analyzed: kim hāsyena iti svapna dṛṣṭa nāyakam sva rūpa sandarśana nihnava parihāsa pravṛttam manyamānasya ripu strī janasya ukti varṇanam

original: kiṃ hāsyena cirātprātpraḥsan punarme darśanaṃ na prayāsyasi?
analyzed: kim hāsyena cirāt prāt praḥ san punar me darśanam na prayāsyasi

original: niṣkaruṇatā taveyaṃ prātpisamakālameva pravāsarucitā ityudīrayannevatamadṛṣṭvā “kenāsi dūrīkṛtaḥ“iti vadan vyāsaktakaṇṭhagraho buddhvā riktabāhulayacastāraṃ  #
analyzed: niṣkaruṇa tā tava iyam pravāsa rucitā iti udīrayan eva tam a dṛṣṭvā kena asi dūrīkṛtaḥ iti vadan vyāsakta kaṇṭha grahaḥ buddhvā
roditi iti
atra aṅga aṅginau dvau api rasau aṅgī rasaḥ
rasavān mata antare
sva mate tu aṅga bhūtaḥ rasavān
atas udāharaṇam etat mata dvaya arham

tat etat vibhajya darśayitum āha atra vākya arthībhūtaḥ iti
vākya arthībhāvāt karuṇe rasavān
mata antare iti śeṣaḥ
aṅga bhāvāt vipralaṃbha śṛṅgāraḥ rasavān
asmad mataḥ iti śeṣaḥ

original: evaṃvidhe hi viṣaye vākyārthībhāvāt aṅginaṃ rasaṃ rasavantamanye pratipedire /
analyzed: evaṃvidhe hi viṣaye vākya arthībhāvāt aṅginam rasam rasavantam anye pratipedire
aṅgi bhūtam tu dvitatīya udāttam

original: dhvanidarśanavidastu aṅgino alaṅkāryatāṃ aṅgibhūtasya rasavadādirūpatāṃ dvitīyodāttāsaṃbhavaṃ ca siddhāntitavantaḥ /
analyzed: dhvani darśana vidaḥ tu aṅginaḥ alaṅkārya tām aṅgi bhūtasya rasavat ādi rūpa tām dvitīya udātta asaṃbhavam ca siddhāntitavantaḥ

original: iyaṃ ca prakriyā rasāntareṣvapi jñeyetyāha-evaṃ rasāntareṣviti /
analyzed: iyam ca prakriyā rasa antareṣu api jñeyā iti āha evam rasa antareṣu iti
udāhāryam udāhartum arham śakyam
prāt pa kāla tā vā udāharaṇasya
arhe śakye prāt pa kāla tāyām ca kṛtyaḥ
ittham rasavat alaṅkāre mata dvayam kakṣyā nibhāgena udāhṛtam

original: preyo 'laṅkārādau tu viśeṣāṃśastu jñāta iti sādhāraṇyenodāhīrṣurāha-preyo 'laṅkārādāviti /
analyzed: preyaḥ laṅkāra ādau tu viśeṣa aṃśaḥ tu jñātaḥ iti sādhāraṇyena udāhīrṣuḥ āha preyaḥ laṅkāra ādau iti
gāḍha āliṅganā iti
mānada māna khaṇḍana mām eti ardha uktyā bhāva avasāna harṣaḥ pratyāyyate
lakṣyayā udajanāya āha atra niyikāyāḥ iti

original: harṣākhyo vyabhicāribhāvaḥ sambhogaśṛṅgāraṃprati guṇātvāt preyo 'laṅkāra iti śeṣaḥ /
analyzed: harṣa ākhyaḥ vyabhicāri bhāvaḥ sambhoga śṛṅgāram prati preyaḥ laṅkāraḥ iti śeṣaḥ

original: vyabhicāribhāvaḥ sambhogaśṛṅgāraṃprati guṇātvāt preyo 'laṅkāra iti śeṣaḥ /
analyzed: vyabhicāri bhāvaḥ sambhoga śṛṅgāram prati preyaḥ laṅkāraḥ iti śeṣaḥ
vyabhicāri antarāya udāharati tad vaktra iti
atra cintā lakṣaṇaḥ vyabhicārī vipralaṃbha śṛṅgāra aṅgatayā preyān
tat etat āha atra cintā ākhyāḥ iti

original: alaṅkārāntarabhramau mā bhūdeti paryāyamasyāha-eṣa eva ceti /
analyzed: alaṅkāra antara bhramau mā paryāyam asya āha eṣaḥ eva ca iti
preyān bhāva alaṅkāraḥ ca iti paryāyau
bhāva śānti udaya ādibhyaḥ bhedam āha bhāvasya ca atra iti
sthiti rūpa tāyām bhāva alaṅkāraḥ
śānti udaya ādi avasthā tu pṛthak alaṅkārāḥ iti bhāvaḥ
kau tau śānti udayau iti atas āha śānti udaya iti
śānti avasthā ūrjasvī samanantaram samāhita tvena vakṣyate
udaya avasthā tu sandhi śabala tābhyām saha pṛthak alaṅkāra tvena iti arthaḥ
dūra ākarṣaṇā iti
kāla kalām api na avasthitim prakurute
atra vipralambha śṛṅgāraḥ na aucityena pravṛttaḥ devyāḥ sītāyāḥ aviṣaya tvāt

original: ato rasaṃ guṇīkṛtya nibandhanameva balāditi ūrjasvī /
analyzed: atas rasam guṇīkṛtya nibandhanam eva balāt iti ūrjasvī
autsukya vyabhicāriṇaḥ pi anaucityāt preyaḥ laṅkāra saṅkaraḥ
tat etat abhipretya āha atra rāvaṇasya ityādi
śānti avasthā lakṣyate iti pratijñātam udājihīrṣuḥ āha samāhitam yathā iti
akṣṇoḥ iti
utkṣubhitena aśruṇā paryāvilaḥ ruṇimā cakṣuṣoḥ apagataḥ ityādinā roṣa apagamaḥ
atas praśāmyat avasthā kopasya iti āha atra kopasya iti
ittham praśamaḥ jñeyaḥ iti āha evam anyatra api iti
rasa bhāva guṇībhāvāt anaucitya pravṛttitaḥ
rasavat preyaḥ ūrjasvi samāhita catuṣṭayam
rasavat tva priya tvābhyām ūrjaḥ praśama yogataḥ
nibandhanam rasavat ādi ākhyām sampratipadyate
bhāva udaya ādi artham sūtram
bhāva udaya sandhi śabala tāḥ ca pṛthak alaṅkārāḥ
ukta sarva alaṅkāra anyatvāt sarva alaṅkāra śeṣa tayā etat traya uktiḥ
pṛthak rasavat ādi vivikta viṣayatayā iti arthaḥ
vyācaṣṭe bhāvasya aṅkura rūpa ityādi

viruddhayoḥ tulya kakṣya tayā viniveśanam sandhiḥ

tayoḥ sampṛkta tvam svarūpam iti āha saṃsṛṣṭi saṃkarayoḥ hi iti
ekasmin iti vipakṣa nāma grahaṇam glapita tve
glapita tvam āvege
āvegaḥ vadhīraṇe
avadhīraṇam priyatama tūṣṇīṃbhāve
tūṣṇīṃbhāvaḥ tu punar vīkṣaṇe hetuḥ

original: atrautsukyaṃ bhāvasyodayaḥ tasya ca guṇabhāva iha vivakṣaṇīyaḥ /
analyzed: atra autsukyam bhāvasya udayaḥ tasya ca guṇa bhāvaḥ iha vivakṣaṇīyaḥ
vāmena nāri iti

original: vāmena kareṇa priyatamāyā nayanāśrudhārāṃ dakṣiṇīna kṛpāṇādhārāṃ pramārjayan kartavyamūḍho 'bhūdityatthaḥ /

tat etat āha atra sneha ākhyaḥ iti

tu ratiḥ prīti mātram
kka akāryam iti

original: atra kkākāryaṃ kva ca śaśalakṣmaṇaḥ kulamiti vitarkaḥ /
analyzed: atra kka akāryam kva ca śaśalakṣmaṇaḥ kulam iti vitarkaḥ
bhūyas pi dṛśyeta sā iti autsukyam
śrutam doṣa praśamāya iti matiḥ
aho kope mukham kāntam iti smṛtiḥ

tān imān nigamayati tat ete etyādi

ubhayam api paripāṭyā sūtrayitum āha krameṇa iti
eṣām tila taṇḍula nyāyena miśratdhe saṃsṛṣṭiḥ

original: ya ete anuprāsādayo bhāvaśabalatāntāḥ pṛthaguktāḥ teṣāṃ saṃbhavānusāreṇa yadi kutracit
analyzed: ye ete anuprāsa ādayaḥ bhāva śabala tā antāḥ pṛthak uktāḥ teṣām saṃbhava anusāreṇa yadi kutracid

original: viṣaye sahabhāvaḥ tadaite kiṃ pṛthakpṛthagevālaṅkārāḥ utta sahabhāvavaicitryamalaṅkārāntarameveti
analyzed: viṣaye sahabhāvaḥ tadā ete kim pṛthak pṛthak eva alaṅkārāḥ sahabhāva vaicitryam alaṅkāra antaram eva iti
cintāyām siddhāntayitum āha tatra yathā ityādi

original: sauvarṇa maṇimayānāṃ pṛthak cārutvahetutve 'pi saṃśleṣato yathā cārutvāntaraṃ tathānuprāsādīnāṃ apyalaṅkārāntarameva /
analyzed: pṛthak cāru tva hetu tve saṃśleṣataḥ yathā cāru tva antaram tathā anuprāsa ādīnām api alaṅkāra antaram eva
saṃśleṣe pi bheda aṃśa sphuṭa tva asphuṭa tvābhyām vicchritti dvayam āha alaṅkāra antara tve ca iti

original: yatobheda utkaṭo 'nutkaṭaśca ato dṛṣṭāntau samañjasāvityāha-ata evetyādi /
analyzed: yatas bhedaḥ utkaṭaḥ nutkaṭaḥ ca atas dṛṣṭāntau samañjasau iti āha atas eva ityādi
utkaṭām utkaṭa tve bhedasya yathārtha tā
saṃsṛṣṭiḥ tridhā iti āha tatra tila taṇḍula ityādi

original: saṅkaraḥ saprabhedaṃ jijñāsito 'pi saṃsṛṣṭyanantaraṃ vakṣyata ityāha-saṅkarastviti /

alakaiḥ vyākulaiḥ lola dṛśā

original: atra pūrvārdhe bhakārāpekṣayā uttarārdhe ca lakārāpekṣayā vṛttyanuprāsaḥ /
analyzed: atra pūrva ardhe bhakāra apekṣayā uttara ardhe ca lakāra apekṣayā vṛtti anuprāsaḥ
ityādau yamakam iti vijātīyayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭiḥ

original: tathā lakalolakalo iti kalolakalola iti ca sajātīyayamakayorapi /

tat etat āha atra anuprāsa ityādi

ānanda mantharā iti

atra upamā vṛtti anuprāsayoḥ ubhayā laṅkārayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭiḥ

pāda ambujam iva iti upamāyāḥ mañjīra śiñjita yogaḥ vyavasthāpakaḥ

original: pāda evāmbujamiti rūpakapakṣesa pratikūlaḥ ambakūlaḥ ambuje tadayogāt /

atas śiñjita yogaḥ yam pāriśeṣyāt upamām prasādayati

adhikāram anusmārayati miśra tvam eva iti

aṅgulībhiḥ iva iti
atra aṅgulībhiḥ iva iti upamā sarojam locanam iva iti upamām sādhayati
rūpaka apohanam sādhane prakarṣaḥ
mukha śabdena prārambha vadanayoḥ abhidhānāt śleṣaḥ
mukhayoḥ abheda adhyavasāyāt śleṣa mūla atiśaya uktaḥ
a taḥ nayoḥ aṅgibhāvaḥ

original: evaṃ ca sati aṅgulībhiriveti yā vākyenoktā yā ca sarojalocanam iti samāsena tābhyāmupamābhyāṃ śleṣeṇa cānugṛhītā mukham iti atiśayo(ktiḥ)
analyzed: evam ca sati aṅgulībhiḥ iva iti yā vākyena uktā yā ca saroja locanam iti samāsena tābhyām upamābhyām śleṣeṇa ca anugṛhītā mukham iti atiśayoktiḥ
cumbati iva iti utprekṣāyāḥ anugrāhikā

original: teṣāṃ balena samutthānādutthitā cotthāpakānāṃ camatkānāṃ camatkārakatvahetuḥ ityaṅgāṅgitā /
analyzed: teṣām balena samutthānāt utthitā ca utthāpakānām camatkānām camatkāraka tva hetuḥ iti aṅgāṅgi tā
atas ṅga aṅgi bhāve mithas pi upakāra prathanāya udāharaṇa antaram trayī mayaḥ pi iti
vāruṇī paścimā diś surā ca
patanam avataraṇam upahatiḥ ca
vyācaṣṭe atra prathamaḥ ityādinā

original: atra vāruṇīti śleṣaḥ trayīmayo 'pyagamaditi virodhapratibhotthāpakaḥ tadvādhakaśca /

original: tatra virodhaśleṣā vanupraviṣṭau yacca kāraṇotprekṣānimittaṃ pātādikāryaṃ tatra vāstavau pātāgripraveśāvupahatihetukapātāgripraveśābhyāmabhedena  #

original: yadyapi śleṣo viridhapratibhotpattihetuḥ yadyapi cātiśayoktiḥ utprekṣānimittaṃ tathāpi nānayoḥ śleṣābhyāṃ sahāṅgāṅgibhāvaḥ /

original: śleṣasya tu viviktau'styevetyata āha-na ca mantavyamityādi /

original: iha śaṅkara eva kṣīrasindhuriti rūpake sādhakam /

original: amṛtaśabdo hi sudhāyāṃ pracuraprasiddhikaḥ kṣīrasindhāvanukūlatarara iti rūpakasamāsa evāyam /

amṛta maya tvam ca na upamām prati bādhakam iti āha aupamāyāḥ tu iti
na bāghakam kintu taṭa stham iti bhāvaḥ

śaṅkara tvena upacaritasya hi siddhaḥ rūpaka tva siddhiḥ
atas upamā utthāpite rūpake viśrāntiḥ iti yāvat
udāharaṇa antareṇa api nyāyam imam draḍhayitum āha yathā vā iti

original: avantīścararūpāt pārijātāt jātāni yaśorūpāṇi prasūnāni digrūpāṇāṃ vadhūnāmavataṃsayāmi, paśyata /

atra api upamā bādha vaimukhyena rūpaka sādhakam darśayati atra avataṃsanam iti

nanu rūpaka siddhi sādhaka abhāve āha atas ca pāriśeṣyāt iti

original: nanu śaradīveti samabhivyāhṛteyam upamā kathaṃ nopamāsādhiketyata āha- natu śaradīveti /
analyzed: nanu śaradi iva iti samabhivyāhṛtā iyam upamā katham na upamā sādhikā iti atas āha na tu śaradi iva iti

original: nyāyato vākyārthībhūtaṃ rūpakamābhāsata ekadeśavirtinyupamā na hi bādhiturm iṣṭe /
analyzed: nyāyataḥ vākya arthībhūtam rūpakam ābhāsate eka deśa virtinī upamā na hi bādhituḥ iṣṭe
yāvatā svayam api ābhāsībhavati iti bhāvaḥ
atra upahāsāya āha hi cāṣeṇa iti
samūhaḥ cāṣam iti sthitau
śa ṣayoḥ abheda āśraya ṇa aṇaḥ
pya vyutpanna pratītā iyam cāṣa śrutiḥ
na khalu tad nibandhanā pañcāśat rūpa samūha siddhiḥ
nanu atarathā alaṅkāra prakrama bhedaḥ syāt iti atas āha na hi ekena iti

original: prakāntenaikenaiva nirvahaṇīyamiti naiṣā rājājñā yena dṛṣṭabādha āśaṅkyate /
analyzed: prakāntena ekena eva nirvahaṇīyam iti na eṣā rāja ājñā yena dṛṣṭa bādhaḥ āśaṅkyate

original: yallaṅghanenadṛṣṭabādṛṣṭayordvayorapi bādhaḥsyāt yato nyāyo 'yamityatata āha-nāpyeṣa iti /
analyzed: yat laṅghanena dṛṣṭa ba adṛṣṭayoḥ dvayoḥ api bādhaḥ syāt yatas nyāyaḥ yam ityatas āha na api eṣaḥ iti
prakrāntena nirvahaṇīyam iti na sārvatrikaḥ nyāyaḥ
kintu viśeṣāḥ vivakṣāyām eva

original: iha tu uttarottaraṃ prakarṣavivakṣeti upamāpekṣayā rūpake sāmyaprakarṣaḥ /
analyzed: iha tu uttara uttaram prakarṣa vivakṣā iti upamā apekṣayā rūpake sāmya prakarṣaḥ
atas vayava gata upamā parityāgena vākya arthī bhūtarūpaka parigrahaḥ eva ucitaḥ
viparyayaḥ tu sāmya nikarṣāt duṣṭaḥ eva
tat etat pratyudāharaṇena draḍhayati yena induḥ iti
atra indu malayajayoḥ dahana viṣaya tva rūpaṇāt sāmya prakarṣaḥ prakrāntaḥ

original: hāraḥ kuṭhārāyata iti tūpamayā prakarṣa nītaḥ /
analyzed: hāraḥ kuṭhārāyate iti tu upamayā prakarṣa nītaḥ
carcām nigamayati tasmāt prakṛtaḥ iti

original: sāmānyaprayoge upamābādhaka iti nyāyopanno rūpakaprakrama eva nirvahīṇīya iti yāvat /
analyzed: sāmānya prayoge upamā bādhakaḥ iti nyāya upannaḥ rūpaka prakramaḥ eva iti yāvat
nyāyaḥ yam atra api jñeyaḥ iti āha bhāṣya abdhaiḥ iti
gāmbhīrya sādhāraṇyāt upamā ābādhe rūpakam eva draṣṭavyam
sādhaka bādhaka abhāve tu sandehaḥ iti uktam anusmārayati sādhaka bādhaka iti

original: itthamaṅgāṅgibhāvasandeha rūpaṃ prakāradvayaṃ vivicya tṛtīyaṃ prakāraṃ vivecayati-tṛtīyastviti /
analyzed: ittham aṅga aṅgi bhāva sandeha rūpam prakāra dvayam vivicya tṛtīyam prakāram vivecayati tṛtīyaḥ tu iti
tam viśadayati yatra ekasmin iti
murāri nirgatā iti
narakaḥ suraḥ nirayaḥ ca
gaṅgā iva iti sat gati prātpi hetutvam
yojayati atra murāri iti
gaṅgā iva iti upamā murāri nirgatā iti artha bheda abhāvāt sādhāraṇa viśeṣaṇena samutthāpitā
naraka iti śliṣṭa viśeṣaṇa uttha ūrthaḥ śleṣaḥ ca apamā pratipatti hetuḥ

original: ekatraiva narakaśabde 'nupraviṣṭau śliṣṭaśabdenobhayopakārāt śabdaśleṣeṇāpyupamā saṅkarārthamāha-atra ca yathetyādi /
analyzed: ekatra eva naraka śabde nupraviṣṭau śliṣṭa śabdena ubhaya upakārāt śabda śleṣeṇa api upamā saṅkara artham āha atra ca yathā ityādi
sat puṣkara iti
puṣkāram vādya bhāṇḍa mukham padmam ca
dyotinaḥ taraṅgāḥ dyotitaḥ raṅgaḥ ca
rajyante smin sāmājika manāṃsi iti raṅgaḥ nāṭya ārambha kriyā
mṛdaṅga sadṛśam jala āsphālana vādyam mṛdaṅga vādyam ca
yojayati atra payasi iva ityādinā
ramante iti sādhāraṇe dharmaḥ

original: ataḥ sāmagrīyogāt sampannā dyotitaraṅgaśobhinītyekasminneva śabde sabhaṅgapadatvāt śabdaśleṣeṇa saṃkīrṇam /
analyzed: atas sāmagrī yogāt sampannā dyotita raṅga śobhinī iti ekasmin eva śabde sa bhaṅga pada tvāt śabda śleṣeṇa saṃkīrṇam
śabda alaṅkārayoḥ eka vācaka anupraveśam udāhṛta caram anusmārayati śabda alaṅkārayoḥ punar ityādi
vijātīyayoḥ eva eka vācakaka anupreśaṃśa
vyavasthā iti yat anyaiḥ uktam tat aprayojakam iti āha ekavācaka ityādi
atra rājati taṭīyam ityādau
eva kāreṇa aṅga aṅgi bhāva sandeha saṅkarau apohati
śabda alaṅkāra tvam tulya jātīya tā

original: udbhāṭaprakāśitastu prakārāntaragocaraśabdārthālaṅkārasaṃkaraḥ saṃsṛṣṭau antarbhāvita iti tasya saṃkaratvamaṅgāṅgibhāva evoktamityāha-śabdārthālaṅkāretyādi
analyzed: udbhāṭa prakāśitaḥ tu prakāra antara gocara śabdārtha alaṅkāra saṃkaraḥ saṃsṛṣṭau antarbhāvitaḥ iti tasya saṃkara tvam aṅga aṅgi bhāve eva uktam iti āha śabdārtha alaṅkāra ityādi
aṅga aṅgi bhāvāt sandehāt praveśāt ekavācake
tridhā tu saṃkaraḥ śabda alaṅkṛtyoḥ eka vācake
prakaraṇām upasañjihīrṣuḥ āha edānīm iti
tatra sūtram
evam ete śabda artha ubhaya alaṅkārāḥ saṃkṣepataḥ sūtritāḥ
vyācaṣṭe evam iti iti
tatra punar ukta vat ābhāsa ūrthasya paunaruktye
cheka vṛtti anuprāsau vyañjana mātrasya
yamakam svara vyañjana samudāyasya
lāṭa anuprāsaḥ śabda arthayoḥ iti paunaruktye pañcakam
sthāna viśeṣa śliṣṭa varṇa a paunaruktye citram
atha sādṛśya vicchittau bheda abheda tulyā tāyām upamāna anvaya upameya upamā smaraṇāni
abheda prādhānye āropa āśraya tayā rūpaka pariṇāma sandeha bhrāntimat ullekha apahnutayaḥ
adhyavasāya āśrayeṇa ātprekṣā atiśayoktī
gamyamāna aupamya āśrayeṇa tulya yogitā dīpaka prativastūpamā dṛṣṭānta nidarśana avyatireka sahokti vinoktayaḥ
viśeṣaṇa vicchittyā samāsokti parikarau
viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya vicchittyā śleṣaḥ
aprastutāt prastuta avagatau aprastuta praśaṃsā
sāmānya viśeṣa bhāva ādinā nirdiṣṭa prakṛta samarthana īrthāntaranyāsaḥ
gamyasya bhaṅgi antareṇa uktau paryāyoktam

original: stutyā nindāyāḥ nindāyā vā stutergamyatve vyājastutiḥ /
analyzed: stutyāḥ nindāyāḥ nindāyāḥ vā stuteḥ gamya tve vyāja stutiḥ
prākaraṇikayoḥ viśeṣa artha niṣedha ābhāse aniṣṭa vidhi ābhāse ca ākṣepaḥ
virodha garbha tayā virodha vibhāvanā viśeṣa artha niṣedha ābhāse aniṣṭa vidhi ābhāse ca ākṣepaḥ
virodha garbha tayā virodha vibhāvanā viśeṣa artha niṣedha ābhāse aniṣṭa vidhi ābhāse ca ākṣepaḥ
śṛṅkhalā vaicitryeṇa kāraṇā mālā eka āvalī mālā dīpaka sārāḥ
tarka nyāyena kāvya liṅga anumāne
vākya nyāyena yathā saṅkhya paryāya parivṛtti parisaṅkhyā arthāpatti vikalpa samuccaya duya samādhayaḥ
sphuṭa artha tve bhāvikam
audāttyena udātta dvayam
citta vṛtti ālambena rasavat preyaḥ ūrjasvit samāhita bhāva udaya sandhi śabala tvāni iti śuddhāḥ
miśra tayā tu saṅkura saṃsṛṣṭī
tat idam abhisandhāya āha evam iti
śabda artha ubhaya alaṅkārān vargaśas vivinakti tatra śabda alaṅkārāḥ ityādi
lāṭa anuprāsa ādayaḥ ityādi
śeṣān udghāṭayati saṃsṛṣṭi saṅkara iti
nanu ca anvaya vyatirekābhyām ukti kta
vyavasthā bhāṅgaḥ iti atas āha loka vat āśrayā śrayi iti
tad alaṅkāryā iti
tad śabdena śabda artha ubhaya parāmarśaḥ
carcitam ca etat śleṣa prastāve
tarhi anvaya vyatirekau kutra nibandhanam iti atas āha anvaya vyatireka kautuka iti
alaṅkārāṇām śabda ādi kārya tve śabda aśabda ādi anvaya vyatirekau tatra nibandhanam

original: nanu śabdādyalaṅkāratve ko doṣa ityata āha-tadalaṅkāratvaprayojakatva iti /
analyzed: nanu śabda ādi alaṅkāra tve kaḥ doṣaḥ iti atas āha tad alaṅkāra tva prayojaka tve iti
śrauta upamā ādau śabda anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānāt śabda alaṅkāra tvam prasajet
nigamayati tasmāt āśraya āśrayi iti
cirantara mata iti ukta arthe saṃvāda samudghāṭanam
śabda nyāsaḥ viṣaya miṣayaḥ durghaṭa artha vyavasthāḥ
carcaḥ gabhīraḥ

original: itthaṃ bhūmrā rucakavacasāṃ vistaraḥ karkaśo 'yaṃ ṭīkāsmābhiḥ samuparacitānena sañjīvanīyam //
analyzed: ittham bhūmrāḥ rucaka vacasām vistaraḥ karkaśaḥ yam ṭīkā asmābhiḥ samuparacitā anena sañjīvanīyam
sūkṣmām avyākulām atra śāstra yukti upaṃbṛhitām
mīmāṃsām upajīvantu kṛtinaḥ kāvya tāntrikāḥ
kāvya prakāśe laṅkārasarvasve ca vipaścitām
atyādaraḥ jagati asmin vyākhyātam ubhayam tatas
iti ālaṅkārika cakravarti dhvani prasthāna parama ācārya kāvya mīmāṃsā prabhākara sahaja sarvajña mahā kavi śrīvidyācakravarti viracitāyām
sañjīvanyām alaṅkārasarvasva ṭīkāyām arthālaṅkāra prakaraṇam samātpam
